1b1(mdo sde): bya
1b2(mdo sde): rtag sang du/ lag rga
1b3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'cha'o// sdo la 'a
2a1(mdo sde): dang ni rgya mtsho dang // ngan song rnams dang gling dang shing // klud+hA
2a2(mdo sde): dang ni mkha' lding dang // rgyal chen 'gro dang 'dun su rnams// 'di
2a3(mdo sde): skad bdag gis rba sa pa'i dus gcig na/ bre com ldan 'das
2a4(mdo sde): mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
2b1(mdo sde): rang na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi
2b2(mdo sde): khams ni gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong spri dud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong
2b3(mdo sde): gnyis pad ma'i 'jig rten gyi/ khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong che/ na po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so// 
2b4(mdo sde): stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ ci tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma rnam par snang ba
2b5(mdo sde): rnams/ kun tu 'khor zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa'i bar yin te/ zla ba stong dang / nyi ma stong dang / ri'i rgyal po
3a1(mdo sde): ri rab stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu gling stong dang
3a2(mdo sde): nu kyi lang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
3a3(mdo sde): pa stong dang / 'thab bral stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang / 'phrul dga' stong dang / gzhan 'phrul
3a4(mdo sde): dbang byed stong dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten rgya
3a5(mdo sde): khams shes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong spri phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
3a6(mdo sde): yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
3b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
3b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su/ mtha' med
3b3(mdo sde): cing mu med la/ 'jig pa'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan
3b4(mdo sde): zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'cha/ gas shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi
3b5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams lho dang nub dang / byang gi phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med lo// 'jig pa'am zhig par gnas shing / 
3b6(mdo sde): 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas te/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// / 
3b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag dper na bar snang las char pa'i 'bru shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab pa na mtshams sam bar chad med pa
4a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ shar phyogs su de lta bu'i stong
4a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am/ zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags/ 
4a3(mdo sde): par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing ga zhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing gzha na chags par gnas pa dang / de bzhin du
4a4(mdo sde): lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su/ de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khams rnams mtha' med cing
4a5(mdo sde): mu med la/ 'jig pa'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas/ 
4a6(mdo sde): lagazhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag
4a7(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i phyir/ gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// de'i tshe na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus
4b1(mdo sde): par gyur te 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bstan pa
4b2(mdo sde): dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di legs te ngo mtshar to// de la steng spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri chen po nyis stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po ri
4b3(mdo sde): rab stong dang / khor yug gi ri stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po nyis stong yod de/ nang gi rgya mtsho chen po stong dang / phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen
4b4(mdo sde): po stong rnam so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dan ngan song gsum stong yod de/ sems can da dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas stong rnam so// 
4b5(mdo sde): stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'jam+bu gling stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong
4b6(mdo sde): dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shing chen po bzhi stong yod de/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i shing 'dzam bu skyong dang / rgyu mtsha
4b7(mdo sde): 'gram na shal me ri'i mthon po stong dang / lha ma yin gyi ris kyi tsid tra pa ta li stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sa brtol stong rnamaso// stong spyi pud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
4b8(mdo sde): na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong de/ klu'i rigs sgo nga las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skyo ba stong rnams so// stong ste/ 
5a1(mdo sde): bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ na mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod de/ namakha' lding gi rigs sgong las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drong / 
5a2(mdo sde): gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod do/ yul 'khor bsrung stong dang / 'phags
5a3(mdo sde): skyes po stong dang / mig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos sras kyi bu stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po lnga stong yod de/ sems can dmyal
5a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'gro ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ 
5a5(mdo sde): lha'i mdun sa chos bzang stong dang // lha ma yin gyi mdun/ sa nor bzang zhes bya ba stong rnams so// 'jig/ rten bzhag pa las tshigs dang po'o// / 
5a6(mdo sde): sdom la// skye gnas ri dang rol mtsho dang // de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan// sems can gnas dgu rab bshad de// las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong spyi bud kyi
5a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnam
5a8(mdo sde): la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi kha cig dang lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can 'dod pa sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag
5b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams so// 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan
5b2(mdo sde): gyi sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas
5b3(mdo sde): gsum pa'o// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bde ba'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas
5b4(mdo sde): brlan par byed cing yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dedag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes
5b5(mdo sde): pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byas shing yongasu brlan par byas te/ yongasu tshim par byas shing yongs su khyad par byas nas/ bde bar reg par gnas
5b6(mdo sde): so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can
5b7(mdo sde): gang dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing / yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongasu tshim por byed cing / yongasu khyab par
5b8(mdo sde): byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing / yongasu brlan par byed de/ yongasu tshim par byas shing / 
6a1(mdo sde): yongasu khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ri shing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta
6a2(mdo sde): ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnamaso// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlan par byed cing / yongs su brlan
6a3(mdo sde): bar byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlan par byas shing / yongs su brlan
6a4(mdo sde): par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing
6a5(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnam/ sa so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ri chen
6a6(mdo sde): po bdun stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin stong dang / bshol 'da' 'dzin stong dang / seng ldeng can stong dang / blta na sdug stong dang / rtan 'dzin stong dang / mu khyud
6a7(mdo sde): 'dzin stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rol mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rol mtsho stang dang
6a8(mdo sde): bshol 'da' 'dzin gyi stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang / blta ni sdug gi stong dang / rta rna ri'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang / rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho stong rnam so// 
6b1(mdo sde): stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang / bsdus gzhom
6b2(mdo sde): stong dang / ngu 'bod stong dang / ngu 'bod chen po stong dang / tsha ba stong dang / rab tu tsha ba stong dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig
6b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rnams dang lha kha
6b4(mdo sde): cig go/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang po'o// sem das can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad la 'du shes cig bdag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang po
6b5(mdo sde): byung ba gang yin pa de dag go// 'di ni sems can gyi gan sa gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 
6b6(mdo sde): 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gsum pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi
6b7(mdo sde): lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnam so// / 
6b8(mdo sde): 'di ni sems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// 'di ni sems can gyi gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te// thogs pa'i 'du shes rnam
7a1(mdo sde): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gan
7a2(mdo sde): pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnam so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha'
7a3(mdo sde): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rnam shes mtha'
7a4(mdo sde): yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnamaso// 'di ni sems ca na gyi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa gang drag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
7a5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci ya/ nga med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa/ ngag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar
7a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams thams cad ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med
7a7(mdo sde): 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnam so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// 
7a8(mdo sde): stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang
7b1(mdo sde): tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba rnam so// srog bcod pa shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas
7b2(mdo sde): pas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
7b3(mdo sde): yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches
7b4(mdo sde): shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzho dam du'o// de bus ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches ya dang bas ni thig nag du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de
7b5(mdo sde): bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyuraro// ma byin par len pa shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du bya ba dang / 'ad
7b6(mdo sde): pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten
7b7(mdo sde): cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar ro// de
7b8(mdo sde): bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
8a1(mdo sde): yang bas ni ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gnom du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig
8a2(mdo sde): nag du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs gnyis pa'o// / 
8a3(mdo sde): sdom la/ mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang // myong ba dang ni bkres dang zas// bdud rtsi'i phyi sa char ba dang // mu ge bde dang bcu tshan no// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na// klu'i rigs
8a4(mdo sde): bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// namakha' lding gi rig das bzhi stong shing shal ma li mthon po la gnas te/ sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang // mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / dod
8a5(mdo sde): gsher las skyes pa stong dang / brdzus te skyes pa stong rnam sa so// nam mkha' lding sgo nga las skyes pa ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga la skye ba 'byin par byed de/ mngal nas skye ba
8a6(mdo sde): ma yin/ drod gsher las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding mngal nas skye
8a7(mdo sde): ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid
8a8(mdo sde): thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher la
8b1(mdo sde): skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci'i ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir// na mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu skong las skye ba dang // 
8b2(mdo sde): mingal nas skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do// klu la klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa dag yod do// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dag
8b3(mdo sde): bo dang / nye dga' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po rtag rgal dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po chen po
8b4(mdo sde): che dang / klu'i rgyal po e la 'dab rnams te/ 'di dag dang gnadan yang klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa na mkha' lding dag gis dbyung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de dag
8b5(mdo sde): ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cing so sor mye nga bar byed de/ shes shing rab tu shes la kun tur ba tu shes so// ji skad du shin tu mthu che ba'i klu dag yod de/ 
8b6(mdo sde): mtha' srung zhing chun gnas te/ de dag lha ma yin dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni dpung yin/ stobs kyang che zhing mthu che klu yin te// shin tu drag po dgra thabs sna chog
8b7(mdo sde): can// lha min rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pas/ de dag brgya byin gyi ni g.yul yang yin/ zhes kyang bya'o// bar gyi sdom la/ dga' bo nye dga' rtag rgal dang // btang bzung dang ni gzi byin
8b8(mdo sde): dang // yul 'khor srung dang nag po che// e la'i 'dab ma phyi ma yin// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de// srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len
9a1(mdo sde): ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa spong ba dang / brnab sems med pa dang / gnod sems
9a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba rnamaso// srog gcod pa spong ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye
9a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyu ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dga' rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chu/ 
9a4(mdo sde): pa dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnams su'o//  bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas
9a5(mdo sde): ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams su'o// de bas chen/ shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// ma byin par len pa dang / 
9a6(mdo sde): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa spong ba dang / chags sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas cher
9a7(mdo sde): kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'dru
9a8(mdo sde): dga' rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnams su'o// de bas ches
9b1(mdo sde): chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / 
9b2(mdo sde): de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// ci ste mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba na yang / srog gcod pa spong bas ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len
9b3(mdo sde): pa spong bas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spong bas ni chung ma dang 'gran zla med par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba spong bas ni skur pa mang bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma
9b4(mdo sde): spong bas mdza' bo dang dbye bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig rtsub po spong bas ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyuraro// tshig khyal pa spong bas ni tshig mnyan par 'gyur ro// chags
9b5(mdo sde): sems med pas ni 'dod chags che bar mi 'gyur ro// gno/ da sems med pas ni zhe sdang che bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dang ga par lta bas ni gti mug che bar mi 'gyur ro// 
9b6(mdo sde): par sdom ni// skur pa med dang mdza' mi dbye// de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thos// nyan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ba ste// yi ge bzhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi
9b7(mdo sde): nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tshe'i tshad bskal par len pa 'di mchog yi no// dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las
9b8(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pas/ sa srung gi bus sa srung gi bu nyid dang / rab tu brtan pas rab tu brtan pa nyid thob pa 'di mchog yino// yi dgas kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ 
10a1(mdo sde): las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po gshin rje gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// 
10a2(mdo sde): mi'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ nga las nus nga las nu nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris myong bar 'gyur
10a3(mdo sde): ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i
10a4(mdo sde): las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ brgya byin brgya byin nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// 2/ thab bral myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang
10a5(mdo sde): gi rnam par smin pas/ rab 'thab bral gyis rab 'thab bral nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// dga' ldan myo nga bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par
10a6(mdo sde): smin pas dga' ldan gyis yongs su dga' ldan nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// 'phrul dga' thob pa'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rab sbrul gyis rab sbrul nyid thob
10a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gis rnam par smin pas/ dbang byed kyi dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog
10a8(mdo sde): yi no// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa dang bsgom pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phag po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen
10b1(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// de
10b2(mdo sde): yan chad la ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la kha zas 'di lta ste/ 'bras chan dang / zan dang / bye dang / sha dang / khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar
10b3(mdo sde): gyi lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni dri'i zas
10b4(mdo sde): dang / bdud rtsi'i zas za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang // 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
10b5(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam sa kyang de bzhin no// de yan chad la ni kham gyi zasamido// rgyal chen bzhi'i bdud rtsi ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / 
10b6(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnamaso// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrug
10b7(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang bshang ba
10b8(mdo sde): gci ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni med do// de
11a1(mdo sde): yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni/ char 'bab mkhas pa dang / char 'bab mi mkhas pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags
11a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi
11a3(mdo sde): rnams la lo legs pa dang / mu ge yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi
11a4(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang
11a5(mdo sde): nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnam sa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral
11a6(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// 
11a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs gsum pa'o// // sdom la/ nyo tshong mdog dang khang pa dang // gding ba dang ni bzhag gos dang // yang ba rdul rab bsgre ba dang // tha dad
11a8(mdo sde): bag ma len dang bcu// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la// nor ram 'bru 'am gser ram// dngul gyi nyo tshong bya ba yod pa bzhin du// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang // nub kyi
11b1(mdo sde): b.lang stod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni med// de yan chad la yang med do// 'di skad du 'jam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni/ nor dang 'dra/ 
11b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis nyo tshong byed do// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams la ni ras dang be'u ras rnams kyis so// nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyis ni ba lang dang / nor bu rnams kyis so zhes zer ba ya
11b3(mdo sde): yod do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dang / dkar po dang / sngo sangs dang / mdog skya snar rnam pa bzhi yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi
11b4(mdo sde): ba lang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi brnyan gyi mi rnams ni mdog gcig pa ste dkar ro// rgyal chen ba bzhi'i lha rnams kyi mdog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / se
11b5(mdo sde): po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bani pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa
11b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi mdog gcig pa ste dkar po'o// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin
11b7(mdo sde): du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med
11b8(mdo sde): dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom
12a1(mdo sde): snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye
12a2(mdo sde): mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams la ni kha dog med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khang pa ched du byas pa
12a3(mdo sde): dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang / khang bzang dang / sa khang rnams yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi
12a4(mdo sde): sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin/ pa'i sa khang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi gzha rnal med khang ni ched du byas pa dang / ched du ma byas pa yin
12a5(mdo sde): pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji blta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnam sa dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams
12a6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs
12a7(mdo sde): pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba
12a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnam
12b1(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang pa yang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni khang pa yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling
12b2(mdo sde): gi mi rnams la gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang / sha na'i ras dang / gso ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / ras gos dang / zab dar dang / ko tam pa'i ras dang / rtsa du ku la'i gos
12b3(mdo sde): dang / a pa ran ti'i ka'i gos dang / ras dang / be'u ras yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyong pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni/ 
12b4(mdo sde): dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams
12b5(mdo sde): dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rna/ mas dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dag/ 'a ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang
12b6(mdo sde): de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang // 
12b7(mdo sde): 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / 
12b8(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha
13a1(mdo sde): rnams kyang gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser/ 
13a2(mdo sde): po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyang
13a3(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams ste/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag gis
13a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la yal ga 'dud par byed/ do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ 
13a5(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// dpag bsan
13a6(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams ste/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lha
13a7(mdo sde): 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ yal ga 'dud par byed do// de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta bu bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 
13a8(mdo sde): 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni// dpag bsams
13b1(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang gding ba dang / bgo ba lci ba dang / yang ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phag
13b2(mdo sde): po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos la ni srang gcig yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i
13b3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi ni srang byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ni srang gi bzhi cha gcig go/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni srang brgyad cha gcig go/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bcu dag
13b4(mdo sde): cha gcig go/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni srang gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha gcig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ni
13b5(mdo sde): srang gi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod do// tshangs ris kyi/ lha rnams kyi ni gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshang / sa ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa 'dun
13b6(mdo sde): na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang
13b7(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / 
13b8(mdo sde): shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab bdu/ 
14a1(mdo sde): la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go// nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul
14a2(mdo sde): gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ sro ma bdun la ni a ba ga na gcig go/ a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ga gcig go// bi ti ga bdun
14a3(mdo sde): la ni nas 'bru gcig go/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams ni kha cig ni khru tshad de ltar brtsis pa'i khru byed dang bzhi pa'o// 
14a4(mdo sde): kha gcig ni khru bzhi pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags podams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu drug go// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni khru sum cu rtsa
14a5(mdo sde): gnyis pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi lus tho pa ni rgyang grags kyi cha bzhi cha gcig go/ sum cu rtsab/ sum pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags byed do// 'thab bral ba rnam
14a6(mdo sde): kyi ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gsum pa'o// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang rgyang grags bzhi cha'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang
14a7(mdo sde): byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags byed dang gnyis so// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad byed do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gcig go// tshangs pa chen po pa rnams
14a8(mdo sde): kyi ni dpag tshad byed dang gnyis so// 'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad med 'ong ba rnams kyi dpag tshad bzhi pa'o// 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad do// ge
14b1(mdo sde): rlung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go// tshad med dge ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// sprin med pa rnams kyi ni dpag
14b2(mdo sde): tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi
14b3(mdo sde): yang de 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha'i lus thob ni dpag tshad stong ngo // mi gdung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis stong ngo // gya nom snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin tu mthong ba po
14b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnam das kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo // / gzugs med pa rnams la ni// bsags pa'i lus med do// 
14b5(mdo sde): nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul pra ra ba yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcigago/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go// nyi zer gyi
14b6(mdo sde): rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ sro ma bdun la ni a
14b7(mdo sde): ba ga na gcig go/ a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go/ ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo 'dzam bu gling gi mi
14b8(mdo sde): rnams kha cig ni gos khru tshad 'di lta bur brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gon no// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams kyi ni khru nyi shu pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni khru bzhi
15a1(mdo sde): bcu'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgyad cu pa gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyang lus la dzi ran pa'i gos
15a2(mdo sde): gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ji lta ba bzhin du// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul
15a3(mdo sde): dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 
15a4(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras
15a5(mdo sde): bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba/ rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu ma thong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// / 
15a6(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la dbang po tha dad do// kha cig la ni po'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra
15a7(mdo sde): mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
15a8(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med/ po'i dbang po yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i
15b1(mdo sde): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / chad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba
15b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom sna
15b3(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ bag ma gtong ba dang / bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
15b4(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnam/ sa la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
15b5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' lnga na pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs
15b6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams la ni bag ma gtong ba yang med/ bag ma len pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / 
15b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / 
15b8(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin
16a1(mdo sde): tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// / sdom la/ grangs dang dus tshigs mtshan mo
16a2(mdo sde): dang // pha ma dang ni rje khol dang // nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhe na// bcu tshan yongasu brjod pa yin// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la// shin tu grang ba dang / shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhin du// 
16a3(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med// 
16a4(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la// dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang / dpyid dang / dbyar dang / ston yod pa bzhin du/ shar dgyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang sprod
16a5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgya la chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams
16a6(mdo sde): dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i
16a7(mdo sde): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang // 
16a8(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu/ 
16b1(mdo sde): mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang
16b2(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /  dum pa dag pa phral mapas ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
16b3(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo med// nyin mo yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs
16b4(mdo sde): pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge
16b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom
16b6(mdo sde): snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la pa dang ma yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
16b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / 
16b8(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' bo rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni ma yang med/ pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha
17a1(mdo sde): rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba
17a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba
17a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ 
17a4(mdo sde): rje bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yo/ dad do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni/ rje/ 
17a5(mdo sde): bo yang med bran yang med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bran yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa
17a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni/ 
17a7(mdo sde): rje bo yang med bran yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa
17a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras
17b1(mdo sde): bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam
17b2(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni 'bru ni yod
17b3(mdo sde): la nor ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni nor ni yod la 'bru ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / 
17b4(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nor yang med 'bru yang med do// tshangs
17b5(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung pa rnam sa dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams
17b6(mdo sde): dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba
17b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu po 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje bo 'am/ 
17b8(mdo sde): bradran nam/ nor ram/ 'bru la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni ci yang zhen/ 
18a1(mdo sde): pa med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni/ 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum
18a2(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang
18a3(mdo sde): mngon par zhen pa med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 
18a4(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad me du dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin me rnyed pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras
18a5(mdo sde): du che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnam/ sa dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnam sa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig
18a6(mdo sde): rten bzhag pa tshig lnga pa'o// / 'jig rten bzhag pa// / bam po gnyis pa// sdom la/ zla mtshan 'khrig dang khu chu dang / 
18a7(mdo sde): tshe bsgyur dang ni chu klung brag/ sa la rdzing bu glang po dang // srungs ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la// bud med zla mtshan can dang / sbrum ma dang / bu bca'
18a8(mdo sde): ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling
18b1(mdo sde): gi mi rnams kyi/  khye'u dang / bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha'am lha'i bu mo phrag pa'am/ ngang bar sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di/ 
18b2(mdo sde): skam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu'am bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma'am pa'o// snyam du sems so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni/ 
18b3(mdo sde): lo drug lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// da' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul dga' ba rnams
18b4(mdo sde): kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dang dang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'udang / bu mo lo bcu lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am
18b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'am/ bang par sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu'am bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u
18b6(mdo sde): dang / bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nas lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing / 
18b7(mdo sde): 'chi ba na de kho na bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od
18b8(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 
19a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams
19a2(mdo sde): de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni/ lus kyi gzugs med de/ de bas na de bzhi ni skye ba yang mi mngon/ 'chi 'pho ba yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi/ 
19a3(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa/ 'khrig pa'i chos ston pa na gnyis kyi gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyong pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan
19a4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pa tsam gyis gdung bzhi par 'gyur ro// 
19a5(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung tsam gyis so// / 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni bgad pa tsam gyi/ sa so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni bltas pa
19a6(mdo sde): tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen
19a7(mdo sde): po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams
19a8(mdo sde): dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / 
19b1(mdo sde): shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam pragle gi mi rnams pa/  d+ha mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa de bzhin d+ha shar gyi lus 'phags pa
19b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / nub kyi ba yang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la yang de bzhin no// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta/ 
19b3(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin
19b4(mdo sde): no/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams
19b5(mdo sde): dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / 
19b6(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa
19b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dud
19b8(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni/ yi
20a1(mdo sde): dgas rnams kyi nyin zhag cig ste/ nyid zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yi dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur
20a2(mdo sde): brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na ni lo khri lnga stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ 
20a3(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo
20a4(mdo sde): stong ste khar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na/ de dag la bdag gi ba med cing / yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ tshe nges
20a5(mdo sde): shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas/ de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa/ 
20a6(mdo sde): yod de/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur la/ res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyuraro// mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhin
20a7(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig yin no// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i
20a8(mdo sde): lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la
20b1(mdo sde): zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga
20b2(mdo sde): brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin
20b3(mdo sde): zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong ste/ 
20b4(mdo sde): ba ra ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dumyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag
20b5(mdo sde): de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig/ ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal
20b6(mdo sde): ba'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lte ra brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang
20b7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de
20b8(mdo sde): lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang / sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom
21a1(mdo sde): / kyi nyin zhag gcig go// khyi mnag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zlab bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi sems can rnams kyi \u0f7f
21a2(mdo sde): tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur badris pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang bye ba brag gsum 'bum drug khri/ 
21a3(mdo sde): brgyad stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la la gcig ste/ dga'/ 
21a4(mdo sde): ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur ba dkris pa'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / 
21a5(mdo sde): los ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen/ bo ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cul/ zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems
21a6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'grod kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ le de lta bur dris pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis nam/ 
21a7(mdo sde): bye ba brag brgya dang / bye ba phrags la gnyis dang / bye ba breg dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag
21a8(mdo sde): gcig go// nyi na ga ga de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo lta bur badris pa'i lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma
21b1(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go// nyin
21b2(mdo sde): zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo
21b3(mdo sde): brgyad stong yod de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams
21b4(mdo sde): kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang da byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhagade sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 
21b5(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ l-i de lta bu ra brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya
21b6(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po che ba'i nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can
21b7(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po che ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i/ 
21b8(mdo sde): ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgya dang / lo bye ba phrag sum cu dang / lo bye ba brag sa ya brgyad dang / bzhi 'bum dang / lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// / bar gyi sdom la// 
22a1(mdo sde): dgu dang gsum dang bcu bzhi dang ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang // nyis brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mo'i grangs kyis lnga cher bshad// de bzhin gcig dang bcu gnyis gcig dang brgya dang / 
22a2(mdo sde): drug cu dang / lnga brgya dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i tsher bshad de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can
22a3(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa
22a4(mdo sde): gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can da dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bska dal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 
22a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni// 
22a6(mdo sde): bskal pa gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha
22a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ bskal ba bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chig
22a8(mdo sde): ni yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi cha'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi mtha' ni brgal
22b1(mdo sde): badru kun pa s+t+wa~M/ bar mdzu 'a ba ni ma nga// srid med kyi stanams pa rdzu rdzu kyimatha'ani bgal pa swA nyaM shun d+hA n+te/ bar mdo 'a ni yod// bsod nams skyes
22b2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal banyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma do 'chi ba ni song // 'bras brgya ba'i lha rnams kyi chud kyi mapa' ni bsgral pa lnga brgya ste/ bar mi
22b3(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa stong
22b4(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mig dung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gya nom snang
22b5(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shin tu ma/ thong ba'i lha rnams kyi/ tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa
22b6(mdo sde): brgyad stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'og men gyi lha rnams kyi ni tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// namakha' mtha'
22b7(mdo sde): yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa
22b8(mdo sde): bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med 'du
23a1(mdo sde): shes med min skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bAr mdor 'chi ba ni sod de// 'didas kyang phyogs na me dag po gsum yod du/ 
23a2(mdo sde): rinag po gsum po dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po de dag gi drang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po/ 
23a3(mdo sde): yod pa de dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi drang
23a4(mdo sde): ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshul rol na/ mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng
23a5(mdo sde): du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang la/ me
23a6(mdo sde): tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs par 'dug go/ de'i nang nas klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang ga dang / sin+na dang / sin+ta dang / bag shu dang / 
23a7(mdo sde): 'di rnams 'bab ste/ gang gi ni shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs
23a8(mdo sde): kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sin+d+hu ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyog
23b1(mdo sde): kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// bag shu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu nub phyogasu
23b2(mdo sde): mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si ta ni byang phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogasu bskor te/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen
23b3(mdo sde): por 'gro'o// 'di skad du/ byang phyogs kha dgur 'gyur ba yi// chu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang // des nA mtsho chen chu zhes bya// tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod// chu klung gang gsin
23b4(mdo sde): du bapag shu dang // si tang bar rlabs dbu ba'i 'phreng ba can da// 'bab cing thams cad bsil ba'i chu yin te/ nus gang khyad par bzhi 'bab ste// phyogs bzhi khi ra khor yug/ 
23b5(mdo sde): ngadag nas 'byung // gang ga shwar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste/ sin+d+hu lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o// pag shu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro// de'i byang phyogs rgya mtsho rA si ta
23b6(mdo sde): 'gro chu klung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni// mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste// re re zhing yang lang brgya khyer nas ni/ chu'i rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro zhes kyang bya'o// ri spos
23b7(mdo sde): kyi ngad ldang de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos shes bya ba yod de/ mchu ra dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' bskor du
23b8(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis brgya 'phang du dpag tshad byed dang bzhi yod pa dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la/ mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na
24a1(mdo sde): sdug pa/ mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyis chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ 
24a2(mdo sde): de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// de'i kho ra khor yug du gser gyi brag bya skyibs brgyad stong yod de/ de thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug
24a3(mdo sde): la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nang gi sa gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa la/ mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong
24a4(mdo sde): ba/ shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na// de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du
24a5(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ 
24a6(mdo sde): der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing dang / gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos
24a7(mdo sde): de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ shing sa la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brten pa zhes bya ba sa la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba zhig yod de/ sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa
24a8(mdo sde): de'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bcu bzhi thur du zug go// sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba na 'dom bcu gsum thur du zug go// gnyis pa'i ni bcu gnyis so// gsum pa'i ni bcu gcig gong ni
24b1(mdo sde): ba'i ni bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa'i ni brgyad do// sa la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bdun thur du zug go/ sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 
24b2(mdo sde): yan lag rnams gang yin pa de ni/ sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go/ 'phreng ba dang po'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa la'o// gnyis pa'i gang yin pa
24b3(mdo sde): de ni/ gsum pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa la'o// bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug pa'i gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// / 
24b4(mdo sde): sa la'i 'breng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa des ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de'i nang ngagi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa la mdzes
24b5(mdo sde): pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na der mi ma yin pa
24b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na bsdug la mdzes pa ste/ der yang yid
24b7(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i shar phyogs
24b8(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyi shu na/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/ dbyings legs shing blta
25a1(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod de/ rdzing bu dal
25a2(mdo sde): gyis 'bab kyi nang gi pad+ma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// 
25a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar
25a4(mdo sde): zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ rdzing bu dal gyi sra 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na/ rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de/ de
25a5(mdo sde): ngag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdze sa pa/ chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de da/ ga gi nang gi pad+mo'i lo ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 
25a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ ba lang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta
25a7(mdo sde): ste/ shing rta la'i bang lo lnga tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro dngar zhing mchog tu dngar ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi
25a8(mdo sde): ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser
25b1(mdo sde): gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
25b2(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
25b3(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu dra'i mdog ltar thal kar 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de'i mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog
25b4(mdo sde): chags ldam bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i srid du/ dpag tshad byed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad
25b5(mdo sde): gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor/ du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che ba/ rgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs zang
25b6(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing / yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang dbyibs legs shing
25b7(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing sreg chags ldam bu chug sher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar ba mche ba drug yod pa sha dag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de 'khor dang
25b8(mdo sde): bcas pa/ dgun zla ba bzhi ni brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do// dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe/ 
26a1(mdo sde): glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa drag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po cheg
26a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rab tu brtan pa srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ brag bya skyibs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab
26a3(mdo sde): tu brtan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang nas/ shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na 'gro na/ res 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro/ res 'ga' ni 'di lta
26a4(mdo sde): ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa ga
26a5(mdo sde): yin pa de nyid mgo 'am rgyab tu zhon te/ sil snyan dang pheg/ rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe gla/ nga po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sa la'i rgyal po
26a6(mdo sde): rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par
26a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ shing sa la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// shing sa la'i 'breng ba dang po'i nang na 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas
26a8(mdo sde): shing 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// gsum pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// bzhi pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang
26b1(mdo sde): yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// lnga pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// bdun pa'i nang na 'dug
26b2(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas/ rdzing bu dal gyis bab par 'gro ba na/ 
26b3(mdo sde): res 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ 
26b4(mdo sde): glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ rgyab tu zhon te/ dasil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag kyang rgya cher byed cing
26b5(mdo sde): 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ rtse zhi nga dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa/ de'i tshe glang po che
26b6(mdo sde): brgyad stong po dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi mtha' kho ra khor yug kun
26b7(mdo sde): nas bskor te/ kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgu spyad nas/ phyir 'byung ba de
26b8(mdo sde): tshe de'i nang na glang po che dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams blangs te shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal nas/ glang po che
27a1(mdo sde): rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la 'bul/ gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zos shing 'thungs te 'drangs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ glang po che gzhan brgyad stong po rnga/ 
27a2(mdo sde): dag kyang rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag blangs shing shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal te za'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
27a3(mdo sde): glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa'i mthu ni de tsam mo// sems can thams cad ni srungs ma dang bcas shing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / mi 'bral te/ sems can
27a4(mdo sde): gang dbang chung bar grags shing bsod nams chung la/ gzi ba/ brjid chung ba de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig srung ste/ dper na ba lang mang po dang / lug brgya phrag ma
27a5(mdo sde): po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis srung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod nam/ sa chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / 
27a6(mdo sde): stong phrag mang po la gcig srung ngo // sems can gang che bar grogs shing / bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ba ste/ 
27a7(mdo sde): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ba de
27a8(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing / bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ 
27b1(mdo sde): ji ste sems can thams cad srungs ma dang bcas/ srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / mi 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba yod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ srungs ma mthu chung ba zhig yin na ni// de
27b2(mdo sde): la zil gyis gnon pa las 'tshe ba yod do// srungs ma bag med cing bag med pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang 'che ba rnams yod do// srungs ma gnyis lhan
27b3(mdo sde): cig 'thun par gyur pas kyang zil gyis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma yin pa la spyod cing ma rigs pa spyod pa yin na/ de dag ni de dag gi chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / mi rigs
27b4(mdo sde): pa spyod pa las kyang 'tshe ba yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i da lha rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dadang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas
27b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas
27b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / bsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po bzhi po de dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / 
27b7(mdo sde): bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas
27b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas/ 
28a1(mdo sde): mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi grwa/ 
28a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnam/ 
28a3(mdo sde): dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad bral te/ ci ste de dag
28a4(mdo sde): gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas rnams mthon po la 'god do// ji ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba byed kyi ches bco lnga la ni rgyal
28a5(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi po de dag nyid kyis/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rna/ mas dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / 
28a6(mdo sde): zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams
