28a7(mdo sde): cad byul te/ ji ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// ji ste de dag gis rkyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das kyis
28a8(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag zla bo byed kyi ches brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi g.yog no shas 'tsho ba rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin/ 
28b1(mdo sde): pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / 
28b2(mdo sde): tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas
28b3(mdo sde): 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin
28b4(mdo sde): pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram ze dar 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo/ byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs byed pa dang / 
28b5(mdo sde): bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sprin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar
28b6(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ 'dug pa dag mang ngam/ zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag
28b7(mdo sde): nyid ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / 
28b8(mdo sde): don byed pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / 
29a1(mdo sde): gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// ji ste mi dang mi ma
29a2(mdo sde): yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rings la ri mor mi byed pa dang / 
29a3(mdo sde): don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing
29a4(mdo sde): bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi dganas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams sum cu
29a5(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma
29a6(mdo sde): yin par 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa dag don mi byed pa/ 
29a7(mdo sde): dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag mi byed
29a8(mdo sde): pa dang gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid ma rang / 
29b1(mdo sde): shing mi mgu bar gyur nas/ yid ma rangs pa nyid kyang byer bzlog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa
29b2(mdo sde): dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams
29b3(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / 
29b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba ni dmi rnams kyi chos mdzes pa ma yin no// rkyen du bab dpa ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma yin no// 
29b5(mdo sde): de ltar lha rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/ la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'a/ phel bar 'gyu ro zhes smos so// ji ste mi dang mi ma yin/ 
29b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs lA ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i
29b7(mdo sde): rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag byed pa dang / gso sbyong
29b8(mdo sde): la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs su 'dus
30a1(mdo sde): shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa
30a2(mdo sde): dang dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe/ 
30a3(mdo sde): 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag
30a4(mdo sde): par blangs nas/ 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni/ de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rna mas yi rangs shing mgu bar gyur nas/ yi rangs pa nyid
30a5(mdo sde): kyang zlos par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi/ dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer
30a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis
30a7(mdo sde): 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nges par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi
30a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos mdzes so// rkyen du bab po// legs so// dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongasu 'grib pa
30b1(mdo sde): 'gyu ro zhes smos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la bde zhing yid bde ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dir/ 
30b2(mdo sde): ni zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla byed la 'am// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir/ 
30b3(mdo sde): nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis// gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla byed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla/ 
30b4(mdo sde): phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra bde ba bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de ni
30b5(mdo sde): nyes par smras pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no// / nyes par ston pa yin gyi legs par ston pa ma yin/ no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa
30b6(mdo sde): ma yin no// dge slong dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 
30b7(mdo sde): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes nga smra'o// de
30b8(mdo sde): bas na des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam
31a1(mdo sde): bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di nyes par smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yi no// 
31a2(mdo sde): nyes par ston pa yin gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyis/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra bcom pa yin zhing / gang
31a3(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu
31a4(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla/ phyed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong
31a5(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gan sa byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// tshig/ sa su bcad pa 'di smras na// legs par smras pa
31a6(mdo sde): yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong
31a7(mdo sde): dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
31a8(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o zhes nga smra ste/ de bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni
31b1(mdo sde): zla byed chos brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla bye la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir//  ci 'dra ba de bzhin
31b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra na/ legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod
31b3(mdo sde): papo yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungaso// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam dpag tshad gcig tu/ gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho/ 
31b4(mdo sde): chen po'i chus pus mo nub pa tsam du yongasu khyab bo// gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ rgya ma tshe chen por dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med
31b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gli/ steng du 'gro ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam yin no// btso/ ma ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung
31b6(mdo sde): ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ glang po rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal
31b7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar pa'i dus kyi tshe// 
31b8(mdo sde): rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho chen po la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do zhes gsungs so// spyi sdom la/ 
32a1(mdo sde): ri dang skye ba'i gnas dag dang // nam mkha' lding dang nyo tshong dang // grang ba dag ni lnga par byas// dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin// 'jig rten bzhag
32a2(mdo sde): pa las tshigs drug pa'o// // 'jig rten bzhag pa/ bam po gsum pa// sdom la/ srungs ma lha'i grong khyer srung
32a3(mdo sde): dang rnam par rgyal// chos bzang rgyu ba'i lam dang 'obs dang skyed mos tshal// sa gzhi dang ni yong 'du sa rtol glang chen rnams// lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin// lha'i
32a4(mdo sde): grong khyer dang lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi bar du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma rnam pa lnga pa dkod pa la/ 'di lta ste/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / 
32a5(mdo sde): lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lag na/ gzhong thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng ba thog/ sa pa'i lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams
32a6(mdo sde): dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi chog/ 
32a7(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu rlung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa 'di lta
32a8(mdo sde): ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa rnams dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
32b1(mdo sde): byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi la 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'bang mdung dang / gzhu rnams so// 
32b2(mdo sde): mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'bang 'dung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung
32b3(mdo sde): ngo/ lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu rlung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ 
32b4(mdo sde): go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos pa nas mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi/ 
32b5(mdo sde): ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang 'dud dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de
32b6(mdo sde): dag/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i
32b7(mdo sde): tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las
32b8(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig
33a1(mdo sde): tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni/ klu rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par/ 
33a2(mdo sde): byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams pam na ni lha ma yin rnams kyi sa sum cu rtsa gsum
33a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang
33a4(mdo sde): po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na dayol go thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rje zhing 'gro'o// // de nas lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag
33a5(mdo sde): na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gnyis gcig tu 'dus paragyur nas lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// 
33a6(mdo sde): der ci ste srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pa ma na ni/ srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par
33a7(mdo sde): byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gnyis pam na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gnyis/ lha ma
33a8(mdo sde): yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas bang rim gnyis pa gang na 'breng thogs/ 
33b1(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gsum po rnams
33b2(mdo sde): lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni srungs ma gsum
33b3(mdo sde): po dag gis/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste/ 
33b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gsum po pham dan ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs mag/ sum po rnams lha ma yin gyis thub cing rdugs par byas
33b5(mdo sde): te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ ba rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod
33b6(mdo sde): par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma
33b7(mdo sde): bzhi po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ji ste srungs ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni
33b8(mdo sde): srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyuro// ji ste
34a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams baman ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par/ 
34a2(mdo sde): byas te dbam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o/ 
34a3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / 
34a4(mdo sde): srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma
34a5(mdo sde): yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis// lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha
34a6(mdo sde): ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma lnga po rnams pham na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma
34a7(mdo sde): yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas steng gi gzhi gang na sum cu rtsa gsum
34a8(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
34b1(mdo sde): ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal
34b2(mdo sde): po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir rtses te/ mchis pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ ko'u shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi
34b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham
34b4(mdo sde): par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyu/ dal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir rtses te 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig/ grogs po dag da ltar gang gi dus la bab
34b5(mdo sde): par soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byi na gyis/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan la bsam sa so// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis
34b6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi mtshan ma rtogs nas/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas/ lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ glang po che'i
34b7(mdo sde): rgyal po rab brtan 'dzam bu gling nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ngo // song nas mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba
34b8(mdo sde): drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun
35a1(mdo sde): bdun g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun/ mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khrang par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la/ lha'i dbang / 
35a2(mdo sde): po brgya byin zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de las gzhan pa'i sum
35a3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams zhon no// de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na/ 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun
35a4(mdo sde): du 'gro'o zhes 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan su ma cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs
35a5(mdo sde): sgo nas byung ste/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du phyi/ na nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang / ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba grang
35a6(mdo sde): yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la/ 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing
35a7(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga'
35a8(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par
35b1(mdo sde): gyur nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu rlung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi chog/ 
35b2(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / 
35b3(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa
35b4(mdo sde): dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang mdung dang / 'bang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangaso// mtshon cha rnam pa/ 
35b5(mdo sde): bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'bang 'dung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal
35b6(mdo sde): telha rnams pha ma na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong
35b7(mdo sde): khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phye bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi
35b8(mdo sde): phyi bzhin skrag pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan
36a1(mdo sde): gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs
36a2(mdo sde): par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi byi bzhin snyeg par byed na ni/ de ltar lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 
36a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na yang lan gsum du 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog go// lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul
36a4(mdo sde): 'gyed do// ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te lha da rnams pam na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis
36a5(mdo sde): phyogs par byas na ni/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag/ 
36a6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing
36a7(mdo sde): skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ ji ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni/ lha
36a8(mdo sde): rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 
36b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/ sgeg par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na
36b2(mdo sde): yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang / lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha
36b3(mdo sde): rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams bam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su
36b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 
36b5(mdo sde): 'dir ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog
36b6(mdo sde): ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ltar lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin pa ma na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs
36b7(mdo sde): par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin
36b8(mdo sde): rnams lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'di 'di ltar lha ma
37a1(mdo sde): yin rnams lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rje'o snyam du
37a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pa ma
37a3(mdo sde): na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// 
37a4(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegapar byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg
37a5(mdo sde): pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'ad da do// snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji
37a6(mdo sde): ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas
37a7(mdo sde): nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 
37a8(mdo sde): 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams
37b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par/ 
37b2(mdo sde): byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing
37b3(mdo sde): skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni/ lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang
37b4(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni shas cher gnas mod kyi bdag cag gis der mi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag 'di ltar snga
37b5(mdo sde): ma 'das pa'i dus nas/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pa/ ma na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs
37b6(mdo sde): par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi
37b7(mdo sde): bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ de ltar lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par
37b8(mdo sde): 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni/ 
38a1(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas nas/ bam par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong
38a2(mdo sde): khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi
38a3(mdo sde): phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste
38a4(mdo sde): lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha ma de yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas
38a5(mdo sde): shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnam
38a6(mdo sde): la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha/ 
38a7(mdo sde): ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba
38a8(mdo sde): 'jug go/ dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyur to// 'di skad du/ gang tshe lha dang lha min lhan cig tu/ gnyis ka 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyed pa na/ shing rta pa ni nyi zla mtshungs
38b1(mdo sde): med de/ lha'i shing rta pa'i mchog yin no zhes kyang bya'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhi na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba mchur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga
38b2(mdo sde): brgya zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ gser gyi ra bas bskor to// ra ba'i 'phang du ni
38b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do// ra ba de las rtsig skyabs rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas
38b4(mdo sde): pa rnams so gyen du 'bang ba'i 'da' yab dang / thur du 'phang da pa'i 'da' yab dang / zam pa rgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yo/ da de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang
38b5(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes te/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ mtshon sna
38b6(mdo sde): brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi zla ba'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa
38b7(mdo sde): bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te/ rlung gis mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems
38b8(mdo sde): te/ 'di skad du lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis// lha'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par
39a1(mdo sde): 'grems/ shes kyang 'byung ngo // lha'i grong khyer den sgo stong du gcig gis ma chang ba yod de/ sgo gcig kyang 'bang du ni dpag chang byed dang gsum/ zheng duni
39a2(mdo sde): dpag chad byed dang gnyis yod do// ske re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / 
39a3(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnams so// zla ba byed pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las
39a4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// / dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no/ nga // sgo re re la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams srung ba'i
39a5(mdo sde): phyir dang / bskyab pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ srungs mgo cha bgos shing mda' cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam
39a6(mdo sde): srang srid du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag
39a7(mdo sde): btab pa zhig yod de/ srang de'i blo g.yas g.yon na/ rdzing bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las
39a8(mdo sde): byas pa dang / pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa yod do// them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul
39b1(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i ba gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa/ 
39b2(mdo sde): dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las
39b3(mdo sde): byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// be DU rI'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas te/ dbyibs
39b4(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug pa mdzes so// rdzing bu de dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me to dag ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos
39b5(mdo sde): yongs su khebs te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i
39b6(mdo sde): gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la
39b7(mdo sde): yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'breng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ be na mo ton / phreng brgyad dag me tog zeng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa 'am/ me tog gi/ 
39b8(mdo sde): rna rgyan legs par brgyus pa bzhin du te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i
40a1(mdo sde): klu dgas sa nas klung shA c-i m+b+ha/  na/ na shA ldan pa / smra dang / seM pya / rab rnam pa na
40a2(mdo sde): bzhag go sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam
40a3(mdo sde): ba bzhi yod do// bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// shing las byas pa'i gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / 
40a4(mdo sde): rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing yod ngo do// / lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar/ 
40a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rol mo'i chu brang sa tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / bi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khaHdang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ 
40a6(mdo sde): 'amang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / snang chang gi btung
40a7(mdo sde): bdag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo rta ba'i sa rnams
40a8(mdo sde): dang zam pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / leg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs/ 
40b1(mdo sde): kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod de/ den sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de rang gi
40b2(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu zheng
40b3(mdo sde): du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad byed dang
40b4(mdo sde): lngas gyen du 'phags so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal dab de'i rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la/ 'di dalta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
40b5(mdo sde): dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i rje ma pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la/ 'di lta ste/ gser las
40b6(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i ka ba rnam pa bzhi gtsugs pa la 'di lta ste/ 
40b7(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi ka ba'i ni ka rten dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / 
40b8(mdo sde): gdung ma rnams dngul las byas pa'o// dngul gyi ni gser las byas pa'o// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas pa'o// shel gyi ni ka rten dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / gdungs ma be DUR+Ya
41a1(mdo sde): las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i byam rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas
41a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la phyam stobs dang ldan pa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser
41a3(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la them skas rnam pa bzhi las byas pa
41a4(mdo sde): ngag yod de/ them skas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i ba gu
41a5(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel
41a6(mdo sde): las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas
41a7(mdo sde): so// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// / 
41a8(mdo sde): bar gyi sdom la// mang rten them pa ka ba dang // byam rten dang ni stobs ldan byam// 'khor sa dang ni spang leb khang // ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin khang
41b1(mdo sde): bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la bags brgya yodade/ bag ma re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re re la gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la
41b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang ni rdzing bu byas pa yod de/ 
41b3(mdo sde): rdzing bu de la mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang
41b4(mdo sde): 'dri lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya la sa byas pa dang / shel las byas ra ba'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsig so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs
41b5(mdo sde): bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing
41b6(mdo sde): chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du
41b7(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen 'khor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs
41b8(mdo sde): yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'breng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'breng
42a1(mdo sde): / rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gul brgyus pa dang / me tog gin rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ zang las skyes pa'i brasna tshogs skad san ci
42a2(mdo sde): 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
42a3(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
42a4(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshodags lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / me snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i cha
42a5(mdo sde): spyad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / skad snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo
42a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog
42a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs
42a8(mdo sde): kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba
42b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas brtse zhing dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams na
42b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod de/ mchur dpag tshad sum brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ 
42b3(mdo sde): lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i mdun sa chos bzang gi sa gzhi dang / yang tog dang / dgab pa dang / spyi bsdus kyi gdung ma dang / yang tog gi rtse
42b4(mdo sde): bzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang / byam dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las byas pa/ 
42b5(mdo sde): dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ de/ la sgo dang / ya phubs dang / g+han+da dang / yang thog gi rtse
42b6(mdo sde): bzhi dang / lun dang / byam chu bai re re la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gis kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod de de'i dbus na bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i ka bzur brgyad pa gsal zhing
42b7(mdo sde): 'phan med la/ rigs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ ske'i rtse mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi bsdus kyi rten la mi reg go/ de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gser gyi khri bzang / 
42b8(mdo sde): po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod de/ der sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / chos
43a1(mdo sde): sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam sring du dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs leg
43a2(mdo sde): shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs
43a3(mdo sde): yod pa rnams legs par skyes pa'i dbyibs legs la yongs su 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'breng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi
43a4(mdo sde): slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'breng ba tha gu la brgyus da pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa/ 
43a5(mdo sde): dang skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim gyis
43a6(mdo sde): kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag zabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las
43a7(mdo sde): byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs la/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas
43a8(mdo sde): skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// 'obs de dag na chung/ 
43b1(mdo sde): rlung rgyum kun dang / zun chogs rnams byas bdan ma dang / das cu rgya gsam pa'i rnarnams tshu kyang ma sa ni dga' ladag 'dugyur byu // 'angs de dag gnyid rnyan/ 
43b2(mdo sde): me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams/ legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'bring bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ 
43b3(mdo sde): dper na me tog 'breng rgyung dang / me tog 'breng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba tha gul brgyus pa dang / me tog gi sA rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes
43b4(mdo sde): pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad daying du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dkurasbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skang snyan pa 'byin to// de
43b5(mdo sde): nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas brtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar
43b6(mdo sde): phyogs dpag chad ci kun/ sub cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos chal shing rtasna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag chad kyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du bag chad nyis
43b7(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ graser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 
43b8(mdo sde): rab de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du 'bang ba dang / thur du 'phang
44a1(mdo sde): pa'i mnga' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod de gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel/ 
44a2(mdo sde): las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na
44a3(mdo sde): shing bal gyi zla ba 'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa btag na ni par shes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du
44a4(mdo sde): yongasu khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams da ni mthor/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grem das te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi
44a5(mdo sde): rkyen gyis ni/ shing rta sna tshogs pa na rlung chen ldang / me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gas ba rnams ni legs par 'grems zhes kyang bya'o// 
44a6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na/ rdzing bu zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de
44a7(mdo sde): yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i ba gu rnam pa bzhi brtsig so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa
44a8(mdo sde): bzhi yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i bgu rnam pa bzhis brtsig so// rdzing bu
44b1(mdo sde): de'i phyogs bzhin themams gser las byas pa dang / dbub las byas pa dang / beDUn las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bzhis kun nas bskor tA/ chu bsil ba dang / chu snang / 
44b2(mdo sde): rtsi lta bus gang zhing / me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs kyang skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad
44b3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa
44b4(mdo sde): rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'brang bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur da pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng
44b5(mdo sde): rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas ba bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad
44b6(mdo sde): snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyon pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / 
44b7(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las
44b8(mdo sde): byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing
45a1(mdo sde): ngag yod do// rol mo'i cha byang sna tshogs/ 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / bi wAng rgyud gsum pa dang / khur rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung
45a2(mdo sde): ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 
45a3(mdo sde): sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i
45a4(mdo sde): sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / si ngal snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / 
45a5(mdo sde): dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas/ dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum/ cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing
45a6(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i blo lam mchur dpag tshad nyi shu/ zhang du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs
45a7(mdo sde): shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// de'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna/ 
45a8(mdo sde): tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog
45b1(mdo sde): 'breng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs snyan cing 'jebs pa
45b2(mdo sde): dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
45b3(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gro sngon po dang / ser po/ 
45b4(mdo sde): dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang nga / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / ha ba
45b5(mdo sde): shang dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs/ lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// lha 'am/ 
45b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i bzhon
45b7(mdo sde): pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ 
45b8(mdo sde): de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // 
46a1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing bu sna tshogs shes bya ba dang / 
46a2(mdo sde): shing rta sna tshogs dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gros dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
46a3(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu
46a4(mdo sde): nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal shi nga rta sna tshogs can gyi dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang
46a5(mdo sde): po sna tshogs shes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad nyis/ brgya lnga bcu / mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ 
46a6(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa la na ka na gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai rgyung+ga las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi
46a7(mdo sde): lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi ni rten ma dang / 
46a8(mdo sde): gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bris shing legs par bris pa/ mtshon sna brgya rtsa gcig
46b1(mdo sde): gis legs par bris pa ste/ 'jam shing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi zla ba 'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhin/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni
46b2(mdo sde): par shes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog rnying ba rnams ni 'dor/ me tog
46b3(mdo sde): gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na// sa gzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldan// me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar
46b4(mdo sde): byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems zhes kyang bya'o// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs
46b5(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal/ cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhigayod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 
46b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog gi 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phre
46b7(mdo sde): rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshog
46b8(mdo sde): skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang
47a1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams
47a2(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang
47a3(mdo sde): khar rnga dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag kyang yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am/ 
47a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma/ thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang
47a5(mdo sde): po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta 'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod
47a6(mdo sde): par sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas pas mngon par dga' bar byed do// de na lha'i drang srong
47a7(mdo sde): rnams rang dgor tshangs par spyod pa spyod do// de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad
47a8(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du ming dpog chad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skar du dpag tshad stong yod la dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ 
47b1(mdo sde): ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur zhes
47b2(mdo sde): bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur ba la/ rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur shes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams
47b3(mdo sde): dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur chal du rtse zhing dga' la dga'
47b4(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang / lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur/ dashing sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mo// sa par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming
47b5(mdo sde): rtsub 'gyur 'tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos chal rtsub 'gyuratshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya
47b6(mdo sde): bcu/ shing du dadag chad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skar du dpag chad stong sa de/ sa gzhi babang po sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi nu
47b7(mdo sde): phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ 
47b8(mdo sde): zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa
48a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i
48a2(mdo sde): tshal na/ rdzing bu 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan 'dres pa rnams dang / lha'i bu mo
48a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa'i tshe yang tshol bar 'dres te shin tu rtse zhing dga'
48a4(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam/ sa su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dre/ sa pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal
48a5(mdo sde): gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dres tsha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha'
48a6(mdo sde): skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga'
48a7(mdo sde): ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mthar skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor
48a8(mdo sde): te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal
48b1(mdo sde): zhes bya na na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na/ rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos
48b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / rgyun rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yong la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga'
48b3(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun tu dga' zhing / rab tu dga' la dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong
48b4(mdo sde): bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal kyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ sa gan pa
48b5(mdo sde): po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la
48b6(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// / 
48b7(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 
48b8(mdo sde): yongs 'dus brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go// 'bang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga byer gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yong do// yongs 'dus brtol gyi yal
49a1(mdo sde): ga lnga yod de/ yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// 
49a2(mdo sde): yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam
49a3(mdo sde): mkha' khyab par 'dug go// yongs 'dus brtol gyi mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// sboms su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu/ 
49a4(mdo sde): yod do// yongs 'dus brtol gyi dri rdzi phyogs su dang dag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur dang ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad
49a5(mdo sde): cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yo/ ngas 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum
49a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ de ni ring po mi thogs par mdab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
49a7(mdo sde): bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa
49a8(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
49b1(mdo sde): bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum
49b2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas
49b3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
49b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba la ngas na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bru par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
49b5(mdo sde): bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skab sa kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam sa kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na
49b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas kun
49b7(mdo sde): tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod ngo do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing longs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bye ba na/ 
49b8(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ da ni ring po mo thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur// zhes
50a1(mdo sde): nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs
50a2(mdo sde): 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dang
50a3(mdo sde): ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
50a4(mdo sde): kyi yongs 'dus brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du dazug go// 'bang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnams ni dpag tshad lnga
50a5(mdo sde): bcur 'gyes so// dge slong dag sum cu gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yong/ 
50a6(mdo sde): 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags/ par 'gyu ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// 
50a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa
50a8(mdo sde): las na da ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro// zhes kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum
50b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na da ring po mi thogs
50b2(mdo sde): par sbal mig 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' shing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs
50b3(mdo sde): 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na da ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar
50b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' dbas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs
50b5(mdo sde): 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongasa'adus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na
50b6(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyu ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do zhes nas/ dge slong dag sum cu
50b7(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bye ba las na/ 
50b8(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyuraro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag
51a1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams/ 
51a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me
51a3(mdo sde): lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// shing yongs 'dus brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor
51a4(mdo sde): cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyo dad do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs
51a5(mdo sde): 'dus brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs so// / bar gyi sdom la/ dang po lo ma ser ba dang
51a6(mdo sde): de nas 'dab lcags sbal mig 'thon// sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus// me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas// shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar ma
51a7(mdo sde): ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'bang du dpag tshad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco
51a8(mdo sde): brgyad cha cig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bris shing legs par bris pa mtsho ni sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na
51b1(mdo sde): shing bal gyi zla ba'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su
51b2(mdo sde): khebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
51b3(mdo sde): rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // a ra mo ni ga
51b4(mdo sde): lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog
51b5(mdo sde): 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni// dper na/ me tog 'breng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkha sa pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa 'am/ me
51b6(mdo sde): tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can
51b7(mdo sde): rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de'i nyen kor na dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
51b8(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs
52a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / bi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar dza dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang / 
52a2(mdo sde): rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed pa pa / mes pa de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud/ 
52a3(mdo sde): rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil
52a4(mdo sde): khang rnams dang / ltang mi lta ba'i sa rnams dang / steng / khang rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / so/ so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud ma rnams zung med kyi tshogs
52a5(mdo sde): kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi smra snyan par sgrogs ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bskos pa dang / 
52a6(mdo sde): zas dang / btung ba dang ldan te/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // sum cu rtsa
52a7(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po sbed mos chal du spyang bas srung gi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du
52a8(mdo sde): 'dug la yA lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu nu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la ma
52b1(mdo sde): pa drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu'i srid du dpag tshad byed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod de/ 
52b2(mdo sde): glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug
52b3(mdo sde): cing / yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar
52b4(mdo sde): dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ gang gi tshe/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi dasar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung
52b5(mdo sde): gi bus mgo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche bai re re la rdzing bu bdu na bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la
52b6(mdo sde): sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo
52b7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// / 
52b8(mdo sde): glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na 'jig pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo su
53a1(mdo sde): yang 'di snyam du 'di bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o na'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i/ 
53a2(mdo sde): lha rnams so sor grong khyer gyi sgo nas 'thon to// bton nas so sor skyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang nas/ 'di lta ste lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo
53a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod
53a4(mdo sde): do ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa de'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed dpa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris
53a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor grong khyer blta na sdug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma
53a6(mdo sde): yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yang grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang
53a7(mdo sde): po thag bzangs ris kyi khang bzangs kyang bdams pa can zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi
53a8(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi mdun sa yang nor bzangs shes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / rtsub 'gyur tshal dang / 
53b1(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i chal dang / dga' ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang / 'di lta ste/ kun tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / 
53b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji lta ba de
53b3(mdo sde): bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ma dang / rab tu dga' ma dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ma'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnams so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
53b4(mdo sde): shing yongs 'dus brtol ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yi/ den rnams kyi shing yang tsi tra ba ta la zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo le
53b5(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srung gi bu
53b6(mdo sde): lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs shes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul
53b7(mdo sde): ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin
53b8(mdo sde): gyi shugs shes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag rdzing zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ 
54a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi yang grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan pa yin no// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ 
54a2(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// // 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshig bdun pa'o// / sdom la/ 
54a3(mdo sde): phyed dang drug dang thang cig mtha'// thung dang grang dang 'bri ba dang // snyog pa dang ni bsdu ba dang // phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du shes pa// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su
54a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad btso brgyad cha cig tu 'dzam bu gling las yol te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi btso
54a5(mdo sde): brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad byed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha
54a6(mdo sde): gcig tu rgya mtsho chen po las yol te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/
