320b2(mdo sde): kyi ri rtsa dag na gnas te/ de na dge ba'i gshes gnyen bgyid bgyid pa las/ slad kyis drang srong de rnams la mi ngan kha cig gis gtses nas/ mngon can bgyid/ 
320b3(mdo sde): bkur bsti dang / rim gro ma bgyis pas drang srong de rnams kyang mi dga' nas li yul spangs te/ nam mkha' la ldings nas yul gzhan du mchis/ de nas ni yi
320b4(mdo sde): yul gyi mi rnams kyang chos lam dad de lta ba ma dag par gyur te/ klu rnams ni dga' ste chab phyung nas li yul yang mtshor gyur to// yun ring
320b5(mdo sde): mo zhig tu mtshor mchis mchis pa las/ slad kyi ya sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rgya gar yul du byung ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad cing / chos kyi 'khor la/ 
320b6(mdo sde): bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su mdzad pa rnams lags na/ mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa nye ba zhig gi dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
320b7(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa rgyas po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ mdo sde zla ba'i snying po gsungs pa'i tshe/ yul khams so so'i mgon po dang / lha klu la sog
320b8(mdo sde): pa bsrungs ma rnams la gtad pa'i dus na/ yi yul yang lung bstan te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / rgyal po ma skyes
321a1(mdo sde): dgra'i bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab brtan dang / lha mo 'brog ma la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas/ 
321a2(mdo sde): pa la gtad nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang 'khor rnam bzhi 'bum phrag du ma dang / namakha' la ldings nas li yul du gshegs te/ da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen
321a3(mdo sde): po bzhugs pa'i thad kar mtsho'i steng ta la bdun srid tsam gyi gnam 'phang gi nam mkha' pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas/ de
321a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis li yul byin gyis brlab dba'i slad du/ bskul ba'i 'od zer phyogs su khyab bar btang / phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gsheg
321a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis kyang li yul byin gyis brlabs pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mchod pa bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
321a6(mdo sde): 'khor dang / yul srung zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags kyi snying po dang / 'od gzer btang nas dus gcig tu sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug tu 'dus par byin gyis brlab
321a7(mdo sde): nas/ dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang li yul mtshor gyur pa 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad nas/ byin gyis brlab nas 'od zer
321a8(mdo sde): de dag las chu'i khar pad+ma sum brgya drug cu rtsa gsum byung / pad+mo re re'i khar yang me mar kha re re byung / de nas 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus nas chab kyi steng g.yas phyogs
321b1(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor nas chu'i dkyil du nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi sras la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mangs par/ 
321b2(mdo sde): na pa ba ta zhes bya ba'i ri snag gi kha dog 'dra ba/ mtsho 'di drol cig ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i seg shang gi slu ba dang / rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses shing
321b3(mdo sde): shan du mtsho dral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang glang mgo'i ri'i steng na/ sku gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i g.yon logs kyi lha khang gi nang na/ da ltar mchod rten chung ngu zhig
321b4(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i sar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i slad du/ dgung bdun de na bzhug so// de nas 'phags pa dkun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ 
321b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer dang / pad+mo dang / me mar 'di dag snang bar gyur/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di rnams gcig tu 'dus nas g.yas
321b6(mdo sde): logs su lan gsum 'khor te/ chab kyi dkyil du nub de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i seg shing gi rtsa ba dang / 
321b7(mdo sde): rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses mtsho dral bas phyis mtshe skams nas/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yul li yul zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ste/ 'od zer lan gsum 'khor ba'i
321b8(mdo sde): sar ni kho ra khor yug tu phyis 'u then gyi mkhar dngar ldan gyi grong khyer chen po rtsig par 'gyur ro// chu'i dkyil du 'od zer nub pa'i sar ni/ yul byin gyis rlob cing srung ba'i ra
322a1(mdo sde): 'dza gra ma'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ngas tsan dan gyi nang du sku'i grib ma nub par byin gyis brlabs te byas pa zhig rgya gar yul nas namakha' la gshegs te
322a2(mdo sde): bzhugs par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang na pad+mo dang me mar byung ba'i sar ni phyis thegs chen po sbed pa'i dge slong po mo gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po sum brgya drug cu rtsa gsum/ rgya po la
322a3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i yon bdag dad pa can rnams kyis brtsigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge slong po mo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu// 
322a4(mdo sde): khyim pa skye bo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ lnga pa rgya rtag tu gnas so// gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sra la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i chos
322a5(mdo sde): rgyas par spod pa phal cher gnas te/ 'di ni dus gsu/ ma du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa yin/ no zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / 
322a6(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang / rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes pa/ rigs kyi bu mo dri ma
322a7(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde lcam dral dang / lha klu la sogs pa la dus thams cad du srungs shig par de bzhin gshegs pas gtad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
322a8(mdo sde): dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mthu chen dang / sman gyi rgyal po byang chub
322b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / rnam thos kyi sras gnod sbyin 'khor sum stong dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes 'khor khri phrag bcu dang / lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor/ 
322b2(mdo sde): stong dang / na mkha'i spyan 'khor brgyad stong dang / lha'i bu gser 'breng 'khor lnga brgya dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas ngos po 'khor stong dang / lha mo lcags kyu can 'khor
322b3(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu dang / lha mo gnas ldan ma 'khor lnga stong dang / rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab brtan dang / lha mo
322b4(mdo sde): 'brog ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pas/ bco dam ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshigs bcas nas/ da li yul bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes te/ deng sang gi bar
322b5(mdo sde): du yang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgyad dang rnam thos kyi sras mgon po dang / lha dang / klu dang // lha mo rnams thog ma sangs rgyas 'ge'u to shin tu gshegs
322b6(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos bskor nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang / mgon po dang / lha klu rnams ga la bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / 
322b7(mdo sde): dam tshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul bsrung zhing byin gyis rlob/ mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / de nas sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas/ dgung lo nyis brgya
322b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po dar ma a sho ka zhes bgyi ba zhig gis sngon sems can mang po zhig bkum pa las slad kyis 'phags pa dgra bcom pa ya sha
323a1(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba zhig gisadage ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ sngar sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa mthol zhing gshegs slad kyis mi brgya
323a2(mdo sde): bar yang yi dam bcas / 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams su mchod pa bgyid
323a3(mdo sde): cing / dogs sa byin can gnyen po byin gyis brlabs pa mchis 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong rtsig tu mchis pa las/ mtsho skams nas li
323a4(mdo sde): yul yang yul stong mchis pa'i tshe/ da ltar 'u then dgyi sku mkhar 'chis pa'i dog sar/ kus po ye na du shul byung nas/ dro dgongs cig btab pa'i nub mo
323a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan pa ba zang po gcig btsas nas/ sngon rgyal po'i bcu/ na mo de kun dga'i ra ba'i bskyed mos tshal du mchi// 
323a6(mdo sde): pa las/ rdzing bu'i nang du khrus bgyid cing mchis pa'i dus na/ rnam thos kyi sras 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' la gshegs pas kyang yas gzigs/ rgyal po'i btsun mos kyang
323a7(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi sras byad bzhin bzang po mthong bas/ sems kyis bur chags pa/ kus po yon du btsas nas/ rgyal po dar ma a sho kas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/ bu
323a8(mdo sde): 'di tshe ring ngam thung / mtshan ma bzang ngan dang / dbang thang ci yod ces brtags na/ ltas mkhan rnams kyi mchid nas/ bu 'di mtshan ma yang bzang / dbang thang yang rab tu
323b1(mdo sde): che ste/ mi tha mal ba ma lags pas rgyal po yab sku tshe ma 'phos par rgyal po gyid par 'gyuraro zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po dar ma a sho ka yang phrag dog skyes te/ khros
323b2(mdo sde): nas kho bo de ltar dbang thang chen/ kho bdag 'tsho zhing srid 'dzin grang / 'di nga la mi dgos kyis bor cig ces mchi nas/ mas kyang bu de mi bor du ni/ rgyal po khro zhing dag
323b3(mdo sde): shul dag che bas bu bkum ste dogs nas/ mas bu de bor ba las slad kyis sa las nu ma byung nas/ de 'tshal ba las ma gum nas ming yang phyis sa nur btag so// de'i rjes
323b4(mdo sde): na rgya rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang ba zhig byung ste/ bu dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu ni mchis na/ stong du bu gcig ma tshang ba rnam thos kyi sras la
323b5(mdo sde): gsol ba btab ste/ bslangs nas rnam thos kyi sras/ kyis bltas na/ khye'u sa nu bsod nams can por/ ba mthong nas blangs te/ rgya rje'u bu skal du stsal/ 
323b6(mdo sde): de nas rgya rje bu de gsos nas slad kyis khye'u chen por skyes nas/ rgya rje'u bu spun dang byis pa rtse rtse ba las 'thabs nas/ khyod rgya rje'i bu ma yin no zhes bgyis pa dang / khye'u
323b7(mdo sde): de glo ba mi dga' nas mi gzhan dag la yang lo rgyus rmos na yang / de ltar gyur nas rgya rje la bdag thog ma skyes pa'i yul chol sa tshol du mchis par ci gnang zhes gsol pa las rgya
323b8(mdo sde): rje'i zhal nas khyod nga'i bu yin te/ yul sa yang 'di yin na/ mi dgar ma byed cig ces lan du ma bsgo ba la mnyan nas/ rgya rje rgyal bu sa nu rgyal po'i thabs stsal te/ dmag stong
324a1(mdo sde): phrag bcu dang bsgrogs te/ nub phyogasu tshol sa tshol du btang ba las/ li yul gyi me skar du byin te/ den mchis pa las rgya gar yul nas kyang / 
324a2(mdo sde): rgyal po dar ma a sho ka'i blon po ya sha zhes bgyi ba la dgu dar nas/ rgya bo ya sha spang spun rje khol 'khor yan chad/ rgyal po la mi dga' ba bdun stong yul nas byung ste/ nub
324a3(mdo sde): phyogs nas shar phyogs su yul tshol sa tshol du mchi mchi ba las/ 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul phyogasu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor gyis tshong pa sher bgyi ba dang / 
324a4(mdo sde): zang bgyi ba gnyis la bsgyum thun mong gcig mchis pa las / ba bu nad langs nas me skar nas zhugs ngam thad kar rtol te/ to lar bros pa las mi de gnyis kyis rjes
324a5(mdo sde): bzhin du bangs pa las to lar slebs te ba be'u 'brang ba las yul de'i ming yang be'u 'brangs pa'is 'bru so lo nya zhes btags/ to la'i zhugs ngam gyi
324a6(mdo sde): ming yang 'di skad du sher zang zhes btags/ de nas mi gnyis kyis bltas na/ yul gzhongs stong pa bzang po zhig gda' nas/ 'di bdag cag gi rgyal bu sa nu'i yul
324a7(mdo sde): sar rung ngo zhes mchid gros su 'tshal nas/ yul sa de lta yang mchi mchi ba dang / 'u then gyi shel chab gong mar mchis pa dang / blon po ya sha'i 'khor dang mjal nas/ khye'u su'i
324a8(mdo sde): mi ga las mchis shes smras pa dang / mi de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu sa nu'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / ya shas kyang rgyal bu sa nu mes skar na mchis pa'i steng du/ pho nyas
324b1(mdo sde): 'brin pa las khyod ni rgyal rigs/ bdag ni blon po'i rigs na/ chu srid gcig tu 'tham ste/ khyod ni rgyal po byas la bdag gis blon po byas te/ 'u then gyi gzhongs
324b2(mdo sde): 'dir yul sar btsugs na rung ngo zhes mchis nas/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu yang 'khor dang bcas te/ 'u then gyi shel chu gong mar mchis nas/ tshar 'ban 'di ko nya'i mgo
324b3(mdo sde): yul hang gu rdo zhes bgyi bar mjal te/ rgyal bu dang blon po ya sha gnyis yul sa la ma dum ste/ dmag bkye ste 'thabs pa las/ na mkha' las rnam thos kyi sras dang / 
324b4(mdo sde): dpal gyi lha mo byung nas bzhugs te/ 'thab tu ma stsal nas/ dogs sa de nyid du rnam thos kyi sras dang nga / dpal gyi lha mo bzhugs pa'i rten khang re re zhig brtsig
324b5(mdo sde): pa yang deng sang gi bar du mchis te/ yul srungs mar ga tso bor rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo mchod pa yang lags/ de nas rgyal bus nu dang / 
324b6(mdo sde): blon po ya sha ya dum nas/ sa nu ni rgyal po bgyis/ ya shas ni blon po bgyis nas/ rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor rgya rnams ni'u then gyi shel chu 'og ma man chad mdo le med ka
324b7(mdo sde): dang / kam shing yan chad du bkod/ blon po ya shi'i 'khor rgya gar rnams ni shel chu gong ma yan chad du rgya dang kong sheshing man chad du bkod/ shel chu dbus ni rgya gar dang
324b8(mdo sde): rgya'i blon po dang / 'bangs stod rims 'dres par bkod nas/ yul gcugs mkhar brtsigs te/ rgya gar dang rgya brang ba'i bu ni li lags te/ skad ni rgya gar dang mi
325a1(mdo sde): mthun/ yi ge ni rgya gar dang bags kyis 'thun/ 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher 'thun/ chos kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgya gar dang bal
325a2(mdo sde): cher 'thun/ li'i 'phral skad ni thog ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du sprul te/ mtshan be ro tsan zhes bgyi bas byis pa phyugs rdzi khyi'u
325a3(mdo sde): 'jos nas/ mu le 'dzi zhes gyi ba gnyis la sogs pa la/ yul tsar ma bgyi bar li skad byung ste/ kun la bslabs nas/ khye'u de gnyis kyang gar mchis pa'i cha su la/ 
325a4(mdo sde): yang ma mchis te/ li skad kyang thog ma 'phags pa rnam das kyis bstan cing brlabs pa lags// thog ma li yul byung nas dgung lo
325a5(mdo sde): du lon pa/ 'ge'u to shan gyi mkhan po mo rku bde shi la soH/ sa pas/ mkhan po bgres rims kyis mkhan po sru rabs la bka' mchis thos pa dang / 'phags
325a6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa dang / li rje'i rgyal rabs kyi yi ge dang zhib tu gtugs na gna' thog ma rgya gar yul tu/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po bgyis pa nas brtsis na/ rgyal po
325a7(mdo sde): ma skyes dgras spyir dgung lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las/ rgyal srid bzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das de tshun chad dgung lo nyi// 
325a8(mdo sde): shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra nas rgyal po dar ma a sho ka'i ba'i bar du/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po rabs bcus rgyal srid bzung ste/ dar ma a shoka
325b1(mdo sde): spyir rgyal po dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo sum cu lags pa'i 'og tu rgyal po sa nu bcas te/ sa nu dgung lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe
325b2(mdo sde): rgya rjes rgyal thabs stsal nas/ thog ma'i yul tsholas tshol du mchis pa las rgyal bus nu dgung lo bcu dgu lon pa'i tshe/ yul li yul brtsugs te/ thog mar
325b3(mdo sde): le rjer zhugs pa yan chad zhib tu brtsis na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lags nas/ li yul yang gdod byung bar gyur/ rgyal bus nus
325b4(mdo sde): thog mar li rjer zhugs nas/ rgyal srid bzung tshun/ chad dang / li rje ba can bzang ba can la brtan/ thog mar li rjer bskos nas/ li rje rabs lnga bcu rtsa
325b5(mdo sde): drug dang / chag che ba gcig byung // / gna' dang po mtsho skams nas rgyal bus nu dang / blon po ya sha la sogs pas/ thog ma zhig bzung ste yu
325b6(mdo sde): brtsugs nas/ rgyal bu sa nu'i bu rgyal po ye'u la zhes bgyi bas/ 'u then gyi dngar ldan gyi grong khyer brtsigs te/ li yul byung nas dgung lo brgya drug cu rtsa lnga 'das
325b7(mdo sde): po'i 'og tu/ rgyal po ye'u la'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi bas/ rgyal por zhugs nas/ dgung lo lnga lags nas li yul du thog ma chos byung ste/ 'jam dpal
325b8(mdo sde): dang byams pa gnyis kyis li yul 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa lags par thug su chung nas/ byams pa ni mir skye ba blangs te/ rgyal po bi dza yas
326a1(mdo sde): b+ha ba zhes sprul/ 'jam dpal ni dge slong 'phags pa bai ro tsa na'i gzugasu sprul nas las dang nyon mongs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i gnas
326a2(mdo sde): yul tsar ma bcu le'i tshal du gshegs te/ li yul na mchis pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / li'i skad kyang byis pa phyugs rdzi rnams la bcos shing
326a3(mdo sde): bstan/ le'i yi ge yang bslabs nas/ de'i 'og tu chos byung ngo // de nas rgyal po ya'u la'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+habasayon bdag bgyis nas
326a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa be ro tsa na'i slad du/ thog mar li yul tu tsa ra mI gtsug lag khang pa brtsi gas par bgyis pa las li rje bi dza ya sam b+ha'i blon po
326a5(mdo sde): dang / 'bangs 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis kyang / tsar mar gtsug lag khang re re brtsig par gsol/ nas brtsigs na mang mo tsam zhig byung ba las rgyal pos
326a6(mdo sde): bsams pa gtsug lag khang rtsig tu ma stsal na ni/ bdag la dngos sdig tu 'gyur/ de snyed cig brtsigs na ni/ slad kyis zhig ral du gyur na yang mi slongs su glo/ 
326a7(mdo sde): ba chung bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa be ro tsa na la zhus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram su la bzhugs pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang
326a8(mdo sde): mchod rten rtsigs shig ces bsgo na/ sdig tu mi 'gyur zhes byung nas/ rgyal pos kyang blon po dang 'bangs rnams la de bzhin du bsgo nas/ tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang
326b1(mdo sde): chen po rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha bas brtsigs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / 'bangs rnams kyis tsar mar gtsug lag khang chung ngu dang / mchod
326b2(mdo sde): rten brtsigaso 'tshal gyi nang na sha ri ram ma stsal pa gcig kyang ma mchis te/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs lags nas/ 'phags pa be ro tsa nas rgyal po bi dza ya
326b3(mdo sde): sam b+ha ba la rgyal pos 'gan de rdungs la 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / rgyal po'i mchid nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum
326b4(mdo sde): du 'dir gshegs te bdag gi lag tu 'gan de ma srul gyi bar du bdag 'gan de mi rdung ngo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu 'jam dpal gyi sprul
326b5(mdo sde): pa dge slong bo ro can na mkha' las de bzhin gags par sprul te/ nyan thos chen po 'a drug dang thabs gcig tu car mar de bzhin gzhi
326b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshul bstan nas rgyal po bi dz+ra ya sam b+ha'i lag tu 'gan de stsal nas/ rgyal pos 'gan de brdungs pa dang / dgung bdun gyi bar du 'gan de'i sgra ma chad par
326b7(mdo sde): byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon sum du gshegs pa'i ngan rtag su gong ma la zhags kyis bcugs pa'i rjes da dung gi bar rdo tsar ma na mchis/ 'phags pa
326b8(mdo sde): nyin thos chen po bcu drug la mchod pa'i rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i bshes cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba yang / car ma'i gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'phags pa rnams kyis
327a1(mdo sde): gter du stsal te/ phyis dus dmus shing dge 'dun la yon bdag mchis te/ 'tsho ba mi 'byor pa'i dus na rin po che'i bshos cha 'di rnams de'i tshe// 
327a2(mdo sde): sa'i 'og nas 'byung zhes 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dag las kyang byung / dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa na'i mchod pa'i rkyen tu klu'i rgyal po hu lor zhes bgyi bas/ kha che yul
327a3(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gcig spyan drangs nas/ nam mkha' las gshegs te da ltar tsa ra ma na bzhugs te/ mchod rten 'di dri
327a4(mdo sde): gtsang khang gi nang na bzhugs te/ grib ma slad rol du gsal bar 'byung / rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhe su bgyi ba tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du
327a5(mdo sde): mchis pa las/ sku gzugs ba der song bgyis ba'i gcig 'chag cing gshegs par mthong na/ sa mtshams med pa lnga byang ngo zhes mchi ba yang nga/ 
327a6(mdo sde): ltar bzhugs/ gtsug lage khang de'i srungs ma zhal gyis bzhes pa yang lha na mkha'i spyan dang / nor bu bzang po zhes bgyi ba lags te/ deng sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang / 
327a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dag dang sbyar na yang / thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsig pa yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon
327a8(mdo sde): bdag 'phags pa sha dag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugaso 'tshal gyi nang na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang / byang
327b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas/ gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ thog ma li yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba yang 'di
327b2(mdo sde): las sba ba ma mchis// / de nas tsar mar 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa nas chos byung // 
327b3(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dzi ya sam b+ha bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun cad rgyal po li rje rabs bdun gyi bar du/ gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs// // de nas de'i 'og
327b4(mdo sde): tu rgya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom dab bu da 'dud ta dang / kha 'ga' sta dang / kha da ga ro yang dang / kha ga drod dang bzhi byung ste/ 'ge'u to shan
327b5(mdo sde): gyi ar+ya sta nar bzhug so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang li rje bi dza bi r+ya bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po ngos srog mkhar gyi steng nas bltas na/ mkhar
327b6(mdo sde): gyi phyi rol tu gser dang dngul lta bur snang ba zhig mthong nas bsngags pa dang / da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen po bzhugs pa slebs nas bltas nas/ sha ba ni
327b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod sangs rgyas kyi lung bstan pa bzhin/ 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i
327b8(mdo sde): rigs bgyis pa dang / su'i phyir brtsig ces rgyal pos zhus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi ba/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa 'bung 'du ta la sogs pa bzhi/ khyod kyi
328a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'os pa 'di dag gi phyir tshigs shig ces bsgo ba dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal pobangasa'i gyi drung du byon nas chos pa
328a2(mdo sde): pas/ rgyal po yang tshe snga ma'i smon lam dran nas/ de ma thag tu dogs brtags pa'i phur bu der btab ste/ gtsug lag khang 'gum ti brtsigaso// de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bir+ya
328a3(mdo sde): 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa'i tshe/ bu chung ngu zhig stor nas rjes bcad de btsal na/ 'gu'i do shan gyi lung bu'i nang na/ da ltar su mi ra zhes
328a4(mdo sde): bgyi ba gtsug lag khang gi nang na/ sangs rgyas 'od su rang gi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bu / dad de/ de nas rgyal pos mchod rten 'di gang gi dus na
328a5(mdo sde): sus brtsigs shes smras pa dang / dge ba'i bshes ga nyin 'phags pa dag gi zhal nas/ mchod rten sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe brtsigs te/ 
328a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sku gdung bzhug so// li yul sngon mtshor gyur pa'i dus na/ mchod rten 'di ris g.yogs te chus ma zhig/ phyis kyang yul 'di mtshor 'gyur
328a7(mdo sde): te/ yang mchod rten 'di ris yog nas chus mi 'jig ste/ sangs rgyas byams pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang mtsho skams nas/ yul du gyur pa'i dus na mchod rten 'di
328a8(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ gnas 'di na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa'i nang na yang / ge'u to shan 'di pho brangs gcig yin te/ 
328b1(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang kun 'dir gshegs shing lung ston sems can gyi don mdzad do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas byang chub sems
328b2(mdo sde): dpa' stong phrag nyi shu yang dus gsum du/ glang mgo ri 'di la mchod pa mdzad du byon nas/ slar gshegaso zhes bstan de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bir+ya dad pa
328b3(mdo sde): shugs chen pos glang mgo ro'i steng du 'ge'u to shan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas bu chung ngu de yang thar par btang ste/ phyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
328b4(mdo sde): thob nas li yul du dgra bcom par 'gyur ba 'di da las snga ba ma byung bas/ 'di ni lam ston pa'o// zhes mo rku bde shi bya bar btags te/ thog ma mo rku/ 
328b5(mdo sde): bde sha'i ming ni de nas byung ste/ deng sang gi bar du yang thub ldan dang / dka' thub kyang mchog las btus te/ mo rku bde shir bsgo ba lags/ 
328b6(mdo sde): 'ge'u to shan dang / 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang 'di gnyis bzhugs pa'i dog sa yang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rims kyis 'byung ngo 'tshal gyis
328b7(mdo sde): zhabs kyis bcags byin gyis rlob pa'i steng du/ 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dang sbyar na yang thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsig pa yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
328b8(mdo sde): dang / yon bdag 'phags pa sha dag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bzhug so 'tshal gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / byang chub
329a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gnyen cing byin che rab ste/ gtsug lag khang gi srungs mar zhal gyis
329a2(mdo sde): bzhes pa yang rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas dros po lags te/ deng sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang / mtshan ma
329a3(mdo sde): dag kyang 'byung ba'i phyir/ li yul gyi gtsug log khang bzhugaso 'tshal gyi nang na gtso bor bgyi ba lags rgyal po bi dza ya bi r+yas 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun cang
329a4(mdo sde): rgyal po rabs gnyis kyi bar du/ gtsug lag khang gzha/ na ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i tshe 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya zhes bgyi bas
329a5(mdo sde): rgya rje'i bu mo pu nye shwa ra zhes bgyi bas/ rgya rje'i bu mo buHshA ra zhes bgyi ba mchis brang du blangs nas/ rgya rje'i bu mo des li yul du srin bu'i sa bon zhig 'tshal te/ 
329a6(mdo sde): mchis nas/ yul ma zha bgyi bar srin bu gsos pa dang / srin bu ma tshar pa'i skabs su blon po rgyus ma 'tshal ba kha cig gis/ rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya rgyal po'i btsun mo
329a7(mdo sde): bgyid pa des sbrul gdug pa mang po ma zhar gso zhing mchis te chen por gyur pa dang / yul phyogasu gnod par glo ba chung nas ji ltar bgyi zhes blon po dag gis zhus pa dang / sbrul gso
329a8(mdo sde): ba'i khang par med thong la kun sregs shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal mo sa de thos nas 'phral du ni rgyal po la rgyus kyis bshad pa'i rngo ma thogs nas/ srin bu shas shig brkus
329b1(mdo sde): te/ gsang thab su gsos te/ slad kyis kha cer dang dang / srin pal phyung nas/ dar dang men tri btags te rgyal po la bstan nas/ rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal
329b2(mdo sde): po yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ rgya gar yul nas dge slong 'phags pa sang ga go sha zhes bgyi ba li yul du byon nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spyan drangs te/ srin bu phal mo che bku
329b3(mdo sde): pa'i dngos sdig bshegs sbyangs bgyis nas/ bo sUr+ya dang / mazhi'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri raH
329b4(mdo sde): mang po tsam zhig stsal te/ de'i slad du dpyid zla ra ba'i ho thog thag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs brnyan ma zho bo star+ya zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang
329b5(mdo sde): na bzhug so zhes 'phags pa dag gis lung bstan pas/ deng sang gi bar du yang li yul gyi dge 'dun sde gnyi/ sa dang / rgyal po dang / blon po man cad 'bangs
329b6(mdo sde): yan cad/ lo re zhing dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo la mchod pa bgyid cing / ril gyis po star+ya'i gtsug lag khang du mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin che rab
329b7(mdo sde): te/ lha ra na ba la dang / rad na shur gnyis srungs mar zhal gyis gzhes pa lags te/ deng sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag dang 'byung / de nas rgyal
329b8(mdo sde): po bi dza ya dza ya zhes bgyi ba la bu spun gsum mchis te/ bu po rab don 'das shes bgyi ba ni/ rgyal srid ma 'tshal te/ bsod nams bgyid cing rgya gar yul du
330a1(mdo sde): mchis/ de'i nu bo bar ma yang rgyal srid ma 'tshal nas/ ban der zhugs te/ ming yang dar mnan da zhes btags nas/ rgya gar yul du chos slob
330a2(mdo sde): tu mchis/ nu bo tha chung rgyal sar zhugs te/ ming bi dza ya dar mar btags rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma de dpa' zhing rtsal che bas gsod skyen dag la dga' nas phu bo ban
330a3(mdo sde): de dar ma man nga rgya gar yul na mchis pa/ chos mnyan bslabs bsgoms pas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur te/ 'phags pa dar ma nan das rgya gar yul nas
330a4(mdo sde): bltas na/ nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma gsod skyen bgyid ni dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen par mthong nas/ glo ba rje ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i
330a5(mdo sde): smad du rgya gar yul nas li yul du mchis te/ nyon 'a/ gyir gyi ri rtse shel chab 'og ma/ shel chab nga nye ba zhig tu spyil bu bgyis te/ den skom
330a6(mdo sde): zhing bzhugs pa las/ nyin cig cig 'phags pa de sha ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba cig tu sprul te/ 'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi slad rol shar phyogs logs na/ 'gus na zhes
330a7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i skang bu zhig mchis pa'i khar byung ba dang rgyal ba bi dza ya darams/ srog ma khar gyi steng nas mthong nas/ mda' gcig 'phangs pa dang / sha de'i barma
330a8(mdo sde): bog nas sha ba ni bros/ rgyal pos ni slad bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang / sha ba de 'phags pa dar ma dang mnan da'i spyil bu'i nang du mchis pa rgyal po slad bzhin du mchis pas
330b1(mdo sde): bltas na/ spyil du'i nang na sha ba ni cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig brlal mangs phog pa 'byin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ phu bo lags par ni ngom 'tshal phu bo dge slong
330b2(mdo sde): dar mnan ngas byin gyis brlabs nas/ phu bo lags par gdong ngo 'tshal te/ rgyal pos btsun pa ci nongs shes bgyis pa dang / khyod kyis bdag la mangs 'phangs te
330b3(mdo sde): bya zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang sha ba ma lags par tshor nas/ bdag gis nongs na khri lan ces bgyis pa dang / dge slong de'i mchis nas/ gcig tu nang khyod
330b4(mdo sde): phu bo yin/ gnyi su nang 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyu/ dar pas/ rgyal po khyod kyis mtshar gyi sdig pa thob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas
330b5(mdo sde): par gyur te/ bshags sbyangs dang bsod nams cher ma byas na mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po de yang 'argya da pa skyes te rab tu mi dga' nas/ 'phags pa dag
330b6(mdo sde): bcom pa de'i zhabs la 'jus te bzod pa gsol/ bshags sbrang bgyis nas bdag gi sdig pa 'di ji ltar byang zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa dar ma nan da'i zhal nas/ da
330b7(mdo sde): 'phral du gzhan byar med kyis/ yul 'dro ti ra zhes bya ba'i gzhongs pa bi na/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// 
330b8(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od bgyid pa'i dus na/ bram zes mgo bslangs te/ rgyal po nyid kyis mgo bcad nas bram ze la stsal pa'i 'i phrin las dga' ba rnams gcig mdzad pa'i sa 'di yin/ 
331a1(mdo sde): gnyisu na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po nas/ li yul byin gyis rlob cing / 'ge'u do shan du gshegs pa'i tshe/ byang
331a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / ri k+Sha ta ko sha zhes bya ba 'di byin gyis brlabs te 'di na bzhugs bzhugs/ deng sa
331a3(mdo sde): gi bar du yang gzugs brlan 'di na bzhugs/ rnam gsum du na 'bod b+ha long zhes bya ba'i tshal chung pha bi na yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis bcags nas/ phyis
331a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo sar byin gyis brlabs te/ gnas 'di rnams srung bar lha 'dzin ri sha dab dang / lha mo a sho ka dang / klu'i rgyal po tag sha
331a5(mdo sde): ka dang / gsum gyis dam tshig blangs te/ deng sang gi bar du yang gnas 'di srung zhing rgyal pos 'di ragatsug lag khang gcig brtsigs na/ snga phyi'i
331a6(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa 'byung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar me yang dad pa skyes nas/ slan cad gsod skyen mi bgyid par dam bcas/ rgyal po
331a7(mdo sde): zla 'od kyis bram ze la mgo sbyin gtong du bgyis pa'i sar de ma thag tu dog sa brtags pa'i phur bu btab nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dang ma nan da'i slad du 'dra
331a8(mdo sde): tir gyi mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs sku mkhar gyi nang du yang lho sgo'i sge'u chung mchis pa'i nang logs na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru nu'i gnas kyi
331b1(mdo sde): steng na/ pa ri tha zhes bgyi ba'i mchod rten gnyen po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang gi gtsug lag khang gcig dang / mchod rten chen po brtsigs ste/ mchod rten gyi nang du de bzhin
331b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung stsal/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung ma zhig pa zhig spyan drangs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhugs/ 'gro
331b3(mdo sde): tir gyi gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ deng sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang / mtshan ma byung / li yul thog ma/ ma ha shA si ka'i sde yang dge slong
331b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dar ma nan da las byung nas/ 'u then na dadro tir gtogs par gtsug lag khang brgya dang dang / ka ma sheng gtsug lag khang brgyad kyi dge 'dun
331b5(mdo sde): yang ma hi shwa si ka'i sder gtogs// / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya'i bu chen po rgyal bu 'don 'das/ sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang rtsig
331b6(mdo sde): par dogs 'jal te brtsams pa las/ yo byad rgyu rkyen gyis mtshal nas/ rgyal bu 'don 'das kyis bsams pa/ gzhan nas ma phrogs pa ma brkus pa/ dkon mchog gsum
331b7(mdo sde): gyi dkor la ma 'bags pa gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gis brtsugs te btsal la/ gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mchis te/ mkhan po 'phags
331b8(mdo sde): pa sa man ta si 'di mkhan por spyan drangs/ stong phyogs thog thag tu yang mchis nas/ nor gtsang ma btsal/ de nas slar log nas rgya yul du mchis pa dang / rgya rje'i blon po
332a1(mdo sde): gcig gyod la chags te dgus par bgyis pa las/ 'don 'dros kyis rgya rjel blon po 'di'i sbyin par bdag dgum par ci gnang zhes gsol pa las/ 
332a2(mdo sde): rjes kyang gnang ste/ gshed mis rgyal bu la ral gyis btab na/ bcad 'phro nas 'o ma byung ste mgum nas rgyu rje la sogs pas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ mchod pa bgyis yon yang
332a3(mdo sde): mang mo tsam zhig phul/ blon po des kyang srog rin gyi yon phal cher phul blangs nas/ slar li yul gyi 'dab nye ba zhig tu 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu
332a4(mdo sde): 'don 'dros kyi nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma rgyal srid 'dzi na cing mchis pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mchis nus/ rgyal bu'i gtson rgyal bu 'don 'das rgya rjes li
332a5(mdo sde): yul gyi rgyal por bskos te/ rgyal po'i rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ong so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po tra dza ya dar ma yang phu bo 'don 'das la mi dga' nas/ 
332a6(mdo sde): sku mkhar gyi nang du yang ma btang / brang du yang ma btub nas/ sang tir gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i sa gzhor mchi shig ces bsgo nas/ phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dres
332a7(mdo sde): kyang / sang tir du mchis te nu bos kyang chu dang rtswa shing la yang dbang skur te/ kho bdag gi rin gyis 'jal te yo byad sbyor zhing mchis pa las/ thog ma rgya gar yul du
332a8(mdo sde): mkhan po 'phags pa sa man ta si 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyogasu bltas nas/ phyag 'tshal te mchod pa bgyis nas smon lam btab spyan drangs pa dang / mkhan
332b1(mdo sde): po yang rgya gar yul nas na mkha' las ldings te/ li yul du rgyal po 'don 'das kyi drung du gshegs nas/ gtsug lag khang ji ltar brtsigs pa'i bshes gnyen
332b2(mdo sde): yang bgyis/ rgyal po spun gnyis rab tu ma mjal ba'i sdums bgyi ba'i slad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang
332b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi yan lag dang / bu smang la sogs pa sbyin gtong ba gyis shing / 'phrin las dka' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ no lo
332b4(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba dang / zlos chos li yul du mi bgyir mi rung zhes lha rnams la gsol nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha
332b5(mdo sde): rnams li yul sang tir bgyi bar gshegs te/ sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'phrin las dka' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ lha rnams zlos chos bgyis
332b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza dar mas blon po dang 'brangs rnams la gcig kyang / der mchir mi gnang ngo zhes bgyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo bzang po sngon ma byung ba de thos nas/ mi/ 
332b7(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig sbran te ma bzod nas der mchis/ slad kyis rgyal po'i 'khor kun gar mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa dang / blon po dag gis rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang / 
332b8(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma yang ma bzod de/ sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang gi mdab tu ni ches pa dang / phu bo rgyal bu 'don dros kyis bsus nas/ spun der mjal ba dang / nu
333a1(mdo sde): bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar mas phu bo la phyag bgyis nas/ pus mo brtsugs thal mo sbyar te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod kyi mthu stobs ma rig nas/ nga rgyal
333a2(mdo sde): gyi dbang du gyur nas/ bdag gis rab tu nongs te bzod pa gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar bzod pa bzhes par ci gnang zhes bgyis pa dang / 
333a3(mdo sde): phu bos kyang bzod pa blangs pa dang / de slar nu bo la bzod pa gsol nas/ lag sbrel te gtsug lag khang du mchis nas mchod pa bgyis/ lha klus no le bgyis pa dang / gtsug
333a4(mdo sde): lag khang brtsigs pa las rje su yi rang nas/ yon phul gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i ngan grogs bgyis te/ rkyen ris bkum ste phul/ thog ma spun mjal
333a5(mdo sde): te bzod pa gsol ba'i sar 'ja' mo ka ka ro dza zhes pa/ gyi ba'i gtsug lag khang lha khang gcig brtsigs nas/ thog ma li yul du sarba sti phaT kyi sde theg pa chung ngu
333a6(mdo sde): pa yang / mkhan po 'phags pas man da si 'di las byung / gtsug lag khang gi srungs ma yang lha ka byi la zhes bgyi bas zhal gyis bzhes te srung / deng sang gi bar du lo gcig
333a7(mdo sde): cing yang / rtag tu ston zla rab tshes bdun dang brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pas 'phrin las dka' ba mdzad pa'i zlos chos no le bgyid de/ yul mi ril gyis chos nya
333a8(mdo sde): cing der mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che bar 'gyi/ de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza yas has/ rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ 
333b1(mdo sde): 'dzag gi rgyal pos li yul du dmag mang po drangs te/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha dang 'thabs pa las/ ga 'dzag gi dmag 'pham ste/ ga 'dzag gi rgyal po yang li rjes
333b2(mdo sde): zhags pas zin nas dgum par bgyis pa las/ thar par gsol nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i mchid nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gis mi dgum par thar par gtang gis/ nam
333b3(mdo sde): khyod dgra choms pa'i dus na/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / slar sbron cig ces bgyis nas thar par stsal te ming yang a nan da se nar btags te/ slar
333b4(mdo sde): shu lig tu btang / de nas dge slong a nan da se na da dang / slad kyis ngagra tshoms nas thog ma la rje da dang dam bcas pa bzhin/ nam mkha' la ldings te li yul
333b5(mdo sde): du gshegs nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i dge ba'i/ bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ li rje yang / dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa a nan da se na'i
333b6(mdo sde): sla du/ som nya'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brtsigs te/ gtsug lag gi srungs pa ma ni rnam thos kyi sras dang / lha ka byi bzhugs te/ gtsug lag
333b7(mdo sde): khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra tis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ kam sheng du chos spel pa'i dgra bcom pa s+ya br-i
333b8(mdo sde): zhes bgyi bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bru nyo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ thog ma ka ne ska'i rgyal po dang / gu zan gyi rgyal po dang
334a1(mdo sde): li rje'i rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti la sogs pas rgya gar yul du dmag drangs nas/ se ked ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra tis/ 
334a2(mdo sde): sha ri ram mang mo zhig rnyed pa ya bru nye'i mchod rten de'i nang du stsal thog ma dog sa rtog pa'i phur bu 'debs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pas
334a3(mdo sde): su bri'i zhal nas/ phur bu 'di la rgyal pos lag pas mas yar lan lnga byabs na/ mngon rtags 'byung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang dogs brtags pa'i shugs
334a4(mdo sde): pa'i phur bu la lag pas lan lnga byabs pa dang / phur bu de la shug pa'i yal ga khru gang pa lnga de ma thag tu de'i nyin par skyes nas/ slad kyis shug pa de'i drung du ba na de
334a5(mdo sde): dag gis dar ma blags pa dang / shug pa de las cho// sa bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas/ slad kyis ban de/ gzhon nu dag dar ma thogs te chos nyan du mchis na
334a6(mdo sde): yang de bzhin du chos 'chad pa'i sgra dag byung ba las slad kyis ban de gcig gis dar ma log par blags nas/ 'di ltar ma yin no zhes lhas bsgo ba dang mnyan nas/ de tshun cad
334a7(mdo sde): chos bshad pa'i sgra yang ma byung / slad kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i chab dka' chab kyis 'tshal te/ chab ma phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge
334a8(mdo sde): slong btsun pa sum pon zhes bgyi ba/ dgra chom su nye ba zhig gis gtsug lag khang de mi zhig par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ klur
334b1(mdo sde): skye bar smon lam btab nas/ de ma thag tu lus las chab phyung nas/ mi'i lus ma bos par shel chu chung ngu'i klur gyur te/ dog sa'i 'og tu nub nas/ deng sang gi
334b2(mdo sde): bar du gtsug lag khang de'i cha ba/ shel chab chung ngu las drangs/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang deng sang gi bar du ma zhig ste/ gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ srungs ma yang lha
334b3(mdo sde): su 'dza' ya dang / phyag brnyan sing ha mu ka dang / shel chab chung ngu'i klu sum bon gyis srungs/ de'i tshe de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza/ 
334b4(mdo sde): ya sang gra ma zhes bgyi ba/ dpa' zhing rtsal che bzhi dag byung nas/ phyi dgra mang po zhag la bsngos nas / sems can phal cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge
334b5(mdo sde): mi la rgol ba zhig byung ste/ dmag gis btab na yang ma khums ste/ rgyal po gcig pus seng ge la brgal te zin nas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de'i ming yang seng
334b6(mdo sde): ge ra btags/ rgyal po de yang ri dgas shor du mchis pa las/ shel chab chung ngu'i 'gram tshal zhig tu dgongs btab pa las/ de'i nub mo tshal de'i nang na zhugs mar
334b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba zhig rgyang nas gda' nas/ slad de nang par bltas na/ dge slong 'phags pa dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha de na bzhugs pa las/ 'od byung ba mthong nas dad pa skyes te mchod
334b8(mdo sde): pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'di na ci mdzad ces zhus pa dang / dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha'i zhal nas/ sa 'di yang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
335a1(mdo sde): brlabs pa lags te/ rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rig so zhesra bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang bgags pa de la dang / 
335a2(mdo sde): pa skyes pa'i slad du/ bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan nas sdig bshags gtsug lag khang gi dog sa brtags pa'i phur bu btab nas/ gser gyis gzhong pa gcig spyi bo la/ 
335a3(mdo sde): bzung ste/ da bdag gis rtsig pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugs shing brtan par 'gyur na/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing
335a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bdag gi gzhong pa 'di nang du sprul par ci gnang zhes smon lam btab pa dang / nam mkha' las sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig gzhong ba
335a5(mdo sde): nang du gshegs nas/ rgyal po sbar bas lhag par dad po skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya shi 'i slad du/ dar ma tir gyi gtsug lag khang mchod// 
335a6(mdo sde): rten chen po brtsigs ste/ nang du sha ri rim mang po tsam zhig stsal pas// gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che bas/ srungs ma rnam thos kyi sras dang / lhaka byi las srungs// 
335a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dar mas rgyal srid bzung ba man cad bi dza ya kir tis rgyal po bgyis pa yan cad/ rgyal po rabs bcu bzhi bar du/ res 'ga' ni yul du phyi dgra gzhan
335a8(mdo sde): gyis dmag drangs te gtses/ res 'ga' ni li rje ngag gis yul gzhan du dmag drangs nas 'bangs kyi chog su gyur/ de'i 'og tu drug gu aM mno shod kyis/ li yul du dmag
335b1(mdo sde): drangs nas 'ge'u to shan man cad kyi gtsug lag khang phal cher mes bsregs te/ yul dmas/ 'bangs 'gribs nas/ gtsug lag khang gsar pa rtsig pa'i rngo ma thog/ de nas de'i
335b2(mdo sde): 'og tu rgyal po bi dza kir ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang 'gra ma zhes bgyi bas/ dgung lo bdun lon pa zhig rgyal por zhugs nas/ slad kyis mi mthar son pa dang / yul 'di
335b3(mdo sde): sus bshig/ ci'i slad du dmags shes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang / blon po dag la smras pa las/ dge 'dun dang blon po rnams kyang / dru gu a ma no shod la sogs pas/ 
335b4(mdo sde): sngon yul ji ltar bshig pa'i lo sgyus zhib tu bshad pa da dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sang 'grams blon po dag la dam/ ngag tshogs ci mchis pa sdus shig ces bsgo nas/ sngon
335b5(mdo sde): gtses shing yul bshig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi yul du dmag drangs te lan blan nas/ yul bshig se mas can phal cher ba kum/ de nas slar log nas/ 
335b6(mdo sde): shel chab 'og ma'i 'gram du mchis pa dang / dge slong bdun zhig chab kyi nang du khrus bgyid cing rtsed mo sna tshogs bgyid par mthong nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa byed ces
335b7(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dge slong de bdun yang de ma thag tu na mkha' las ldings nas/ rgyal po de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan pa dang / rgyal po de'i yid la bdag gis sngar yang
335b8(mdo sde): sems can mang mo zhig srog bcad de bkum/ da yang 'phags pa de rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa rab tu nyes so snyam pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gi
336a1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ dad pa yang ches skyes te/ 'phags pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa'i drung du bsnyen nas/ mchod pa/ 
336a2(mdo sde): dang bshags sbyang bgyis/ bzod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa po gnyan re sta la sogs pa 'phags pa bdun gyi phyir 'gu zhin gyi gtsug lag khang
336a3(mdo sde): brtsigs ste/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bdun gyis kyang dog sa de byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhi ba'i sa dgazhan te zhes bgyi bar gtsug lag khang gi mtshan yang btags
336a4(mdo sde): te gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin che rab ste// lha 'dzin ri shi ba dang nor bu bzang po gnyis kyis srung / 
336a5(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi bas/ rgyal po/ ra zhugs nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra
336a6(mdo sde): bcom pa dar ma pa la/ 'phags pa khyod rdzu 'phrul tso mnga' ba bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pas/ 'phags pa des rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha
336a7(mdo sde): dga' ldan du khrid de/ 'phags pa byams pa bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / zhal bstan nas slar mchis pa dang / rgyal po bi dzi ya sing ha sa bzha' ser ma'i
336a8(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ dga' ldan byams pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis/ slad kyis byams pa la mchod pa'i slad du/ mgon
336b1(mdo sde): po dang / lha klu gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ci 'dra ba/ mgon po'i rten khang gcig brtsigs nas mgon po dang lha klu'i gzugs bgyis pa dadung bzhugs te
336b2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang / 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas srung / deng sang gi bar du mngon brtags dang / mtshan ma dag kyang
336b3(mdo sde): 'byung / de nas de'i 'og tu yang rgyal po bi dze ya ba la man cad rgyal po rabs drug gi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ba la zhe/ 
336b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i bu/ rgyal po bai dza ya sang gra ma zhes bgyi pa rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe cu gu pa na nas tshe de'u ba na'i sku gzugs na mkha' las ldings te/ li
336b5(mdo sde): yul du gshegs pa rgyal pos mthong nas dad pa'i shu gas kyis sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i dri gtsang kha nga brtsigs// de nas slad kyis rgyal po de/ 'u then gyi
336b6(mdo sde): skra mkhar gyi steng gi byang sgo'i sgo khang na mchis pa zhig gi tshe na/ bltas na sku mkhar gyi slad rol na dge slong gcig khyim pa skye bo la phyag 'tshal te/ bka' mchid mchi
336b7(mdo sde): be mthong nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyal po des blon po gcig mngags nas/ zhib tu rtogs tu btang ba las blon po des dge slong dang skya bo so sor rmas na/ dge slong
336b8(mdo sde): de'i mchid nas khyim pa skye bo 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa lags shes mchi/ khyim pa skye bo de'i mchid nas dge slong 'di 'phags po sa'i snying po'i sprul pa lags
337a1(mdo sde): shes mchi ba dang / blon po des kyang rgyal po la de bzhin du slar gsol ba dang / rgyal po bi dz+ra ya sang gram yang de ma thag par 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsnyen nas
337a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa dag ga las gshegs shes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa gnyis kyi zhal nas/ bdag cag gnyis kyang shar phyogs nas de bzhin ga
337a3(mdo sde): pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sems can gyi don la 'dir 'ong so zhes 'byung ba dang / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i mchid nas/ 'phags pa thugs rje dang
337a4(mdo sde): ldan pa gnyis kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobasakyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pa
337a5(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i zhal dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan pa dang / rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs
337a6(mdo sde): pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong nam mkha' las shing rta'i nang nas sangs rgyas mang mo zhig gshegs nas/ de dag gis 'od zer gtang ba rgyal po'i spyi
337a7(mdo sde): bor rig par mthong ste/ dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ji ltar mthong bzhin du/ gzugs su yang bgyis te/ shing rta'i nang du byang srang du yang drangs
337a8(mdo sde): nas/ mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ deng sang gi bar du yang dbyar zla ra ba yar gyi ngo la byang srang du sku gzugs chen po 'dren pa dang / dge 'dun sde gnyis spyan
337b1(mdo sde): drangs nas/ byang chub 'byung gnas bkra shis bsil ba'i tshal du mchod ston gsol zhing / mi d+yo ra'i mchod pa chen po bgyis pa yang rgyal po nges bgyis nas/ dge ba'i bshes
337b2(mdo sde): gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa mo dgu bde shi a pa ya rdang gi slad du/ bzha' sang gre re ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang yang dag shes bgyi ba yang srung
337b3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sha sta man cad / rgyal po rabs bzhi'i bar du gtsug lag khang gsar pa gzhan ma brtsigs te/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti zhes bgyi ba
337b4(mdo sde): 'gum tir du mchis pa las da ltar b+ha ba nya'i gtsug la dag khang bzhugs pa'i sar mchis pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zhig der byung nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti la
337b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ sngon sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe/ dog sa 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ gtsug lagakhang brtsigs pa'i sa 'di yin te/ da yang rgyal po
337b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gcig rtsig pa'i rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos smon lam btab pa da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'phags pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs te/ 
337b7(mdo sde): 'dir gshegs par gnang na/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig par 'tsha lo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu namakha' las 'phags pa dgra bcom
337b8(mdo sde): ba bcu bdun gshegs nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya kir te yang dad pa'i shugs chen por skyes te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo lag dar te/ b+ha ba nya'i sgoms dang / gtsug
338a1(mdo sde): lag khang brtsigs te gtsug lag khang 'di yang byin che zhing mnyan par bgyi/ lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang po srung / gtsug
338a2(mdo sde): lag khang 'di yang gna' bod kyi mnga' ris su gtogs pa'i tshe/ mgar blon pa tsan gnyen gung rton li yul gyi dbang po bgyid pa'i tshe/ brtsigs pa lags de nas de'i
338a3(mdo sde): 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma dang / bu rgyal po bi dza ya gra ma sprad/ rgya yul du mchis nas/ slar li yul du mchi ba'i bar du/ dra gu'i dmag gis shul khums
338a4(mdo sde): pa las/ pa ni rgya yul du gum/ bu chung ste sla/ ra mchi ba'i rngo ma thog pa'i skabs su li blon po a ma tsa khai meg ces bgyi bas dgung lo bcu gnyis kyi bar
338a5(mdo sde): du rgyal tshab bgyis nas/ rgyal srid bzung ba 'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge slong 'phags pa ba ru na tsa zhes bgyi ba'i slad du a ma na 'di'i mchod rten dang / 
338a6(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang rtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram mang du stsal te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di lha na mkha'i sman dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang
338a7(mdo sde): ngag shes bgyi bas srung // / de nas rgyal po bo dza ya sang gra ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya bi gra ma zhes bgyi bas/ slar li yul mchis nas/ 
338a8(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyin 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bde ba na 'dra ching gi slad du/ gtsug lag khang byin gre rma brtsigs te/ da ltar lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang // 
338b1(mdo sde): nor bu bzang po srung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgya'i blon po ser the shi dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma gnyis kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gum tir gyi bar mog 'dzin sen
338b2(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ bong mkhar gyi byams pa me ti'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung / de nas de'i 'og
338b3(mdo sde): tu rgya'i blon po ka the shi dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sa ma b+ha ba zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen u de na 'dra rod ci dang / da ra ma ne ned gnyis kyi slad du/ 
338b4(mdo sde): khe gan tse'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung / thog ma dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa na tsa ra ma'i tshul
338b5(mdo sde): du gshegs pa/ phyug rdzi la sogs pa/ mi 'og ma dag gis mthong nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sa ma b+ha la bdag cag gis snga na mthong ba'i mi
338b6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu zhig/ tsar ma'i tshel na mchis so zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba yang de ma thag tu tsar mar mchis nas/ 'phags pa be ro tsa na mthong
338b7(mdo sde): ba dang / dad pa skyes nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa des kyang rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas legs nyes gnyis kyi
338b8(mdo sde): 'bras bu ston to// chos bshad gshegs sbyang bgyid du stsal pa dang / rgyal po de yang chos kyi mig bye nas/ lhag par yang dad pa skyes nas/ rgyal po slar sku
339a1(mdo sde): mkhar du mchis nas/ thog ma 'phags pa be ro can gshegs so zhes bka' mchid snyan pa thos pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig brtsigs te/ 
339a2(mdo sde): ming yang su stonyar btags/ slad kyis mchod rten de yang yun rings pas ni gnas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal ba bi nga ya bo tan chen po dang / rgya yul nas mchis pa'i dge
339a3(mdo sde): slong 'ba' la shi zhes bgyi ba mchis pas/ tsar mI dge ba'i bshes gnyis du spyan drangs nas/ su sto nya'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos
339a4(mdo sde): kyi sras kyis srung // / dge slong mI gtsug lag kha rnams kyi gtan tshigs dang / snga phyi'i gro rims la
339a5(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba zhig chung ngu nas rgyal por zhugs te/ chungs pa'i skabs su blon po kha cig gis mngan can bgyes te/ rgyal mo dang / 
339a6(mdo sde): mchis brang sras dang / nang kor ma rnams dag dang mi rig pa bgyis nas/ slad kyis rgyal po de chen por gyur te/ sngar blon po de dag gis dang na can bgyis shing / brnyas
339a7(mdo sde): pade dran nas khon par gyur to// slad kyis rgyal po des blon po rnams ri dgas shor ba ltar thabs kyis brid nas/ 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul bar bya zhes bgyi bar/ 
339a8(mdo sde): blon po bdun cu rtsa lnga bkum nas/ slad kyis der gtsug lag khang gcig kyang brtsigs/ de nas sku mkhar tu mchis nas/ rgyal po mchis pa'i gnas na/ rgyal
339b1(mdo sde): mo dang / sras dang / nang kor ma mchis pa'i khang pa phyi sgo bkum nas 'dul bcad de bzhin du dgum par bgyis pa las/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa
339b2(mdo sde): phongs te/ nyam thag nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nas brjod mchod pa bgyis te/ lha khang bskor dar ma blags/ bsod
339b3(mdo sde): nams cher bgyis pa'i mthus rgya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom ma ya sha pradz+nyA dang / s+tha shu ta dang / song ha na ta la sogs na mkha' las ldings te/ 
339b4(mdo sde): rgyal mo mog sha ko sha dang / sa lu tsa la sogs dpa 'khor mchis pa'i drung du gshegs nas/  rgyal mo de dag la chos bshad de rab tu byung ba las/ dad
339b5(mdo sde): pa'i shugs kyis de ma thag tu rgyal mo de dag gi 'a khor las brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dgra tshoms par gyur ra nas/ na mkha' las ldings te/ bsod snyoms
339b6(mdo sde): len tu gshegs nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang has mthong nas/ de ma thag tu gnas der mchis te bltas na/ rgyal mo mog sha ko sha dang sa lu tsa la sogs pa'i 'khor
339b7(mdo sde): ri la rab tu byung ste/ phal cher dgra choms par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ rgyal po yang rab tu dga' nas/ dad pa'i shugs kyis
339b8(mdo sde): gnas de nyid du gtsug lag khang brtsigs te bran zhing dang / nar phyogs la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad mang po tsam zhig phul nas/ gtsug lag khang de'i ming yang
340a1(mdo sde): nu'o nya zhes btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang mnyan nying byin che bar bgyi/ da ltar lca bur ba'i lag pa zhes bgyi bas srung / 
340a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po don 'das kyi btsun mo// rgya rje'i sras mo sho r+ya zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo// dge slong ma sho'i 'dza' ya zhes bgyi bas dgra tshoms nas/ nu mo shor
340a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal yul nas 'u then du mchi ba'i phyir/ nu mo rgyal mo shos ras yo zo 'jo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar
340a4(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po de ci dang / da ra ci gnyis srung // / de nas de'i 'ogatu rgyal po bi dza ya sha sta'i nu bo a ma ca za re'i
340a5(mdo sde): mchis brang bu su ha cho ha zhes bgyi ba/ khyim thab gum ba dang / bud med de la rgyal po'i mchid nas/ bdag dang mi phrad du mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / 
340a6(mdo sde): bud med de'i mched nas/ bdag dgung bdun zhig khyim thab kyi mdun bgyid cing / smad rol du mi mchi bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du
340a7(mdo sde): gnang nas de ma thag tu bud med de yang gsang ste rab tu byung nas/ dgung bdun bgyi bar du sems rtse gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ 
340a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal yang mngon sum du mthong nas/ dgra tshoms te ming ying bu ta nan ta ra btags de nas dgung 'dun lags pa dang / rgyal pos
340b1(mdo sde): bud med de 'gugs pa zhig btang ba de'i mchid nas/ mo rab tu byung te/ 'phags ma dgra tshams mar gyur nas/ da ltar 'on kyang 'byung zhing mchis zhes
340b2(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / rgyal po der mchis na 'phags ma de la 'on kyang 'byung / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa yang mthong na/ dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa 'bud nan da'i slad
340b3(mdo sde): du/ ze ro 'jo'i gtsug lag khang bi rtags ste/ gnyen zhing byin cher bgyid ltar lha dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba srung // 
340b4(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya nan da zhes bgyi ba tseg/ nan gyi rgyal po hu mar bya ba'i mchis brang dang 'jal ba'i bu mo gcig cig mchis pa rab tu byung nas// dgra bcom
340b5(mdo sde): bar gyur pas bltas na/ bdag ni li rje bi dza ya ma ta'i bu mo lags par thugs su chud nas/ 'a/ phags ma dar ma 'bal la de dang / dge slong ma
340b6(mdo sde): 'phags ma nyi shu shu lig nas na mkha' la ldings te/ li yul du gshegs nas rgyal po yab la thogs ma'i lo rgyus kyang bshad/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
340b7(mdo sde): bstan pas/ rgyal po yang dad pa skyes nas bu mo 'phags ma dgra choms ma dar ma 'bal la'i slad du/ po yin do'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos
340b8(mdo sde): kyi sras dang / klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi ba srung // / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gram seng ge zhes bgyi ba'i ma/ rgyal mo
341a1(mdo sde): dar ma shes bkyi ba rab tu byung nas/ dgrabacom ma'i 'bras zla tha nas/ sprul ba'i nang du sgopa zhing / mchis pa las/ nubs 'ong byu / 
341a2(mdo sde): rgyal pos mtshan ma gzugs pa'i phyir/ mi 'a cig 'phangs pa nang par mda' tshol du btang ba'i sa don rgyal po'i mdar den bzhugs pa mthong nas/ rgyal po yang
341a3(mdo sde): dad pa skyes te/ ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa dar ma zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal pos 'gro mo 'dza' zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsegs te/ da ltar
341a4(mdo sde): lha ser skyes srung // de nas rgyal po'i dza yA sang gra ma'i nu bo bre su su lag ces bgyi bzhig gis/ rgyal mo dgu mo zhig ra
341a5(mdo sde): tu byung nas ming yang a zhu ka sum zhes bgyi bar btag sa te/ dgra tshoms pa'i slad du dad pa skyes nas trake 'jo zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang
341a6(mdo sde): brtsegs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis srung // / de nas gtsug lag khang 'gun na brtsigs pa'i
341a7(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i mchis brang / rgyal po brom ke sar gyi bu mo'u rong ka zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo gnyis rab tu byung nas/ dgra tshoms te/ 'phags ma de gcig gi
341a8(mdo sde): mtshan ni/ shi la ma te zhes bgyi/ gcig gi mtshan ni go'u sha ra zhes bgyi ste/ 'phags mde gnyis kha che yul nas/ na mkha' la ldings te/ nu mo rgyal mo'u rong ka'i
341b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gshegs te/ 'phags ma de gnyis kyi slad du/ rgyal mos ho bon 'jo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te da ltar klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi ba da
341b2(mdo sde): gser gyi skra zhes bgyi ba gnyis srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti'i bu mo bi zha 'dza' yas phu mo 'phags pa dgra bcom ma byi ta she tsa'i
341b3(mdo sde): slad du po long 'jo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya'i bu mo gu
341b4(mdo sde): zan gyi rgyal po'i mchis brang bgyid pa/ byi na bra ba zhes bgyi bas/ bu mo dge slong ma 'phags ma da dgra bcom pa bizha 'dza' ya'i slad du/ er mo no'i
341b5(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te da ltar lha ser skyas srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bal zhes bgyi bas/ snga slad du sems can mang
341b6(mdo sde): mo zhig bkum nas/ 'gyod pa skyes te/ bsod nams phal cher bgyis/ mchis brang yang thar par btang nas/ 'phags ma dgra bcom mar gyur pa'i slad du dad pa skyes
341b7(mdo sde): nas/ kho be na no'i gtsug lag khong brtsigs te/ da ltar rnams thos kyi sras kyis srung // / de nas li rje'i blon po a ma tsa khe meg ces bgyi ba pu po
341b8(mdo sde): spun gsum gdugs gcig tu bkum nas/ ma yang thar par zhugs nas/ de nyid du a ma tsa khe meg gis gus sde re ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha nam/ 
342a1(mdo sde): mkha'i spyan dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis srung // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya 'dza' ya zhes bgyi bas/ 
342a2(mdo sde): oM sku'i rgyal po'i bu mo mchis brang du blangs te/ rgyal mo des dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma dgra bcom ma gzhi ma'i slad du/ oM sko na'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da
342a3(mdo sde): ltar lha che ma zhes bgyi bas srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya grams kus byi or nyong nag gi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ nang kor ma mang zhig
342a4(mdo sde): thar par bkye nas da ltar rgyal po kun srung ma lha mo gser gyi me tog dang / lha mo dung can gnyis srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya ba
342a5(mdo sde): las cu gum pan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo shu to ka zhes bgyi ba mchis brang du blangs pa'i bu mo dge slong ma dgra bco ma ma a sho ka shi la'i slad du/ tse'u no'i gtsug lag khang
342a6(mdo sde): brtsigs te/ da ltar lha a pa la dang / lha 'jam pa ki'u ta zhes bgyi ba gnyis srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i mchis brang ga 'dzag gi rgyal mo a
342a7(mdo sde): lcong 'ja' zhes bgyi ba'i bshes gnyen du sha lig nas/ dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa bdun gshegs pa'i srid du/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing has khye'u sho no'i gtsug
342a8(mdo sde): lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha ser skyas srung // / rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma/ rgyal mo bgyid pa'i tshe kha ce yul nas/ dge slong ma 'phag
342b1(mdo sde): ma dgra bcom ma shi la ta dang / 'gi'u shu r+ya shes bgyi ba gnyis na mkha' las ldings te/ gshegs nas/ slad kyis khyim bdag na mo bong bgyi ba'i khyim drung du zhugs nas/ 
342b2(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dogs 'di ni sngon sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sa shed
342b3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/ bram ze la bu ming sring gnyis yon du phul te/ 'phrin las dka' ba rnams cig mdzad pa'i sa 'di legs pas/ 'dir gtsug lag khang cig brtsigs
342b4(mdo sde): pa'i rig so zhes bgyis pa dang / khyim bdag na mo bod ces bgyi ba de yang / dad pa skyes nas khang khyim drang se de yang yul du phul nas/ rgyal pos kyang gtsug
342b5(mdo sde): lag khang gcig brtsigs/ yon bdag las kyang ming dras nas/ gtsug lag khang gi mtshan ya/ ngan mong 'bu 'dong zhes bya bar btags/ da ltar klu'i
342b6(mdo sde): rgyal po hu lor dang / lha gser gyi sgra zhes bgyi ba srung // / de nas li rje'i blon po 'da' no zhes bgyi ba zhig gis tshong 'dus bar mar sku gzugs chen po
342b7(mdo sde): bgyis pa las/ slad kyis yang li blon po e ma tsa bya nad kyis/ sku gzugs chen po'i lha zhig ral du gyur pa yang gsos/ kong shing gi dge slong ma'i slad du 'da' na yon
342b8(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te// da ltar rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung // 'u then na dge 'dun sde gnyis bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por
343a1(mdo sde): brtsi ba/ sku mkhar gyi nang dang srad rol na drug cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'bring du bgyi ni dgu bcu rtsa lnga lags/ 
343a2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang chung ngur bgyi ba ni/ rgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bzhug/ sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha gang chung ngu dang / yon bdag ma mchis po'i lha gang dang / mchod rten ni sku
343a3(mdo sde): mkhar gyi nang dang / slad rol gyi tshar yan cad na/ sum stong drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ 'u then na dge 'dun sgos 'tsho yan cad/ byi ba lo la bairtsis
343a4(mdo sde): na khri tsam zhig bzhugs/ mdo lo dang / mes dkar phyogs ni gtsug lag khang chen po ni bzhi zhig bzhugs sgo ske'i lha gang dang / yon bdag ma mchis
343a5(mdo sde): pa'i lha gang chung ngu ni/ brgya lhag tsam bzhugs/ dge 'dun nyi shu tsam zhig bzhugs/ kam shing dang / pa nya dang ba rga 'dra dang / o sku yan cad ci la
343a6(mdo sde): man cad/ sku mkhar gyi nang dang / slod rol gyi tshar yan cad na gtsug lag khang chen po ni nyi shu rtsa gsum bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'bring nyi shu rtsa gcig
343a7(mdo sde): bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang chung ngu ni nyi shu rtsa gsum tsam bzhugs sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha gang chung ngu dang / mchod rten chung ngu sprir brgyad brgya sum cu rtsa dgu bzhug/ 
343a8(mdo sde): dge 'dun sde gnyis las rkyen pa dang / sgos 'tsho yan cad spyir bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// / gyil kyang man cad ko shing dang / du
343b1(mdo sde): yan cad sku mkhar gyi nang dang / slad rol gyi tshar yan cad na/ gtsug lag khang chen po bco lnga tsam bzhugs/ sgo sgro'i lha gang chung ngu dang / yon bdag ma mchis
343b2(mdo sde): pa'i lha gang chung ngu dang / mchod rten yan cad bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis la rkyen pas/ sgos 'tsho yan tsang spyir dgu brgya drug cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/ rgyal no
343b3(mdo sde): swa nu'i tsha bo rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha zhes bgyi ba'i tshe/ thog ma li yul du chos byung ste brtsis nas/ khyi'i lo'i shol bor ba'i ston zla tha chung yan cad/ dgung lo stong
343b4(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug tsam pa lags// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nan da mi tra aM ba d+ha
343b5(mdo sde): Na ma nA ma bod skad du/ 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
343b6(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag cag gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad brgya lon par gyur pa na/ de'i tshe
343b7(mdo sde): de'i dus na/ yul shi ba ga zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po rigs pa'i sde zhes bya ba gnas so// de'i tshe rgyal po
343b8(mdo sde): rigs pa'i sngo'i yul na/ dge slong dga' ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ 
344a1(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag dum pa sems can rnams las tha na grog ma dang / ku ta yi yang sems can spyod pa shes pa zhig gnas
344a2(mdo sde): te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa bshad de/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams the
344a3(mdo sde): tsom skyes nas dris pa/ gnas brtan yun ji snyed cig gi bar du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag dogs
344a4(mdo sde): pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan la das 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas brtan chen po bcu drug
344a5(mdo sde): gi lag tu dam pa'i chos gtad par gyur te/ sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa yong su dag par bya ba'i phyiraro// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan dge
344a6(mdo sde): pa'i bshes gnyen la dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces smraso// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gi mtshan yang mi 'tshalo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa
344a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan dang po'i mtshan ni ba ra de tsa bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan ni gser bu zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gsum
344a8(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan ni ba rang tsa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bzhi pa'i mtshan ni mi phyed pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan lnga pa'i mtshan ni shing shun can zhes bya'o// gnas brtan drag pa'i
344b1(mdo sde): mtshan ni bzang po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bdun pa'i mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan brgyad pa'i mtshan ni bad sa'i bu zhes bya'o// gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang
344b2(mdo sde): skyong zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu pa'i mtshani ni lam pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gcig pa'i mtshan ni sgra can 'dzin zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gnyis kyi
344b3(mdo sde): mtshan ni klu sde zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gsum pa'i mtshan ni zur gyis shes zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan ni nags na gnas pa zhes bya'o// gnas
344b4(mdo sde): brtan bco lnga pa'i mtshan ni ma pham pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu drug pa'i mtshan ni gtsug gi lam zhes bya'o// / gnas brtan de dag ni rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ sde snod
344b5(mdo sde): gsum pa/ khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bra la ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe byin gyis pa/ rlabs te bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
344b6(mdo sde): bka' gnas pa yin no// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa yong su dag par byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis gnas brtan dga' ba'i
344b7(mdo sde): ba shes gnyen la 'di skad ces smraso// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gang na bzhugs pa'ang mi 'tshalo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan dang po ba
344b8(mdo sde): rad tsa bsod snyoms len zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu ba glang spyod kyi gling na gnaso// gnas brtan gser bu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga
345a1(mdo sde): stong dang lhan cig byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul na gnas so// gnas brtan pa ra da tsa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig sha
345a2(mdo sde): gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na gnas so// gnas brtan mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan
345a3(mdo sde): shing shun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na gnaso// gnas brtan bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dgu
345a4(mdo sde): stong dang / lhan cig zangs gling na gnas so// gnas brtan nag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig sing ga'i gling na gnas// 
345a5(mdo sde): gnas brtan pad sa'i bu ni 'khor dgra bcom pa khri cig stong dang lhan cig pa ni sa'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan pa lang skyong zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dag
345a6(mdo sde): bcom pa brgyad stong dang lhan cig ri bo spos kyi ngad ldan na gnas so// gnas brtan lam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig lha rnams kyi
345a7(mdo sde): gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na ga nas so// gnas brtan sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu pri ya ma ku'i gling na gnaso// gnas
345a8(mdo sde): brtan klu'i sde zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri skya bo na gnaso// gnas brtan zur gyis shes zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra
345b1(mdo sde): bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig ri bo ngos yangs na gnas so// gnas brtan nags gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu bzhi dang lhan cig/ 
345b2(mdo sde): lus 'phags kyi ri la ga naso// gnas brtan mi pham pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bco lnga dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
345b3(mdo sde): gnaso// gnas brtan gtsug gi lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu drug dang lhan cig ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin na gnaso// gnas brtan de dag
345b4(mdo sde): gis mi shes pa'amam mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am mngon sum du ma byas pa cu dang zad kyang med do// dge 'dun gyi bzhes pa 'am/ 
345b5(mdo sde): spyan drangs pa 'am/ bco lnga ston nam/ gtsug la ga khang dbul ba 'am/ 'gan 'di'i rab gan sa sam/ gang cung zad mi shes pa med de/ de dag tu
345b6(mdo sde): go nas brtan bcu drug po de dag dang / 'khor du bcas pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis der byon shing gnas te/ de ltar sbyin pa yong su dag par byed de/ ma 'ongs pa na
345b7(mdo sde): mtshon gyi skal ba byung 'das nas/ mi rnams dge ba bcu dang / ldan pas tshe slar 'phel te/ lo brgya thub pa na ston pa'i nyan thos de dag yang phyir la 'dzam bu gling
345b8(mdo sde): du byon nas/ dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston par byed cing / rab tu 'byin par byed de/ de srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du
346a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pangs pa'i chos gnas par 'gyurate/ mi rnams kyi tshe la bdun brgya bar gyur pa na/ 
346a2(mdo sde): thos de dag gis sa'i steng 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gcig byas te/ kun nas
346a3(mdo sde): bskor nas dkyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la
346a4(mdo sde): 'dud pas phyag 'tshalo// zhes brjod de phyag 'tshal nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'ang 'a ba'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan la 'da' bar 'gyu ro// rin
346a5(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de yang nub nas/ 'og gi gser gyis bzhi gang yin pa de la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i
346a6(mdo sde): chos nub par gyur to// de nas de'i rjes la rang sangs rgyas byed pa phrag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri bar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
346a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byam pa zhes bya 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / 
346a8(mdo sde): mi dang skye bo mang pos yongasu gang shing bya gag 'phur ba tsam na grong khyer dang grong dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyur// 
346b1(mdo sde): lan cig sa bon btab pas lan bdun gyi bar du 'bru rnams skye bar 'gyuraro// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa lan gsum du 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag
346b2(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gsum pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dag
346b3(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dus pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ yang de dag gis bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
346b4(mdo sde): pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba ba/ skrun cing bya ba byas par gyur pa yin te/ 'di lta da lte/ gser gyi rang bzhin dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin
346b5(mdo sde): dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin dang / shel gyi rang bzhin dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin dang / ragan gyi rang bzhin dang / 'khar ba'i dngos po dang / 
346b6(mdo sde): mu tig dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin dang / zangs kyi dngos po dang / tsan dan gyi dngos po dang / a gA ru'i rang bzhin dang / dung gi rang bzhin dang / ba so'i rang
346b7(mdo sde): bzhin dang / ra ba'i rang bzhin dang / rtsa'i rang bzhin dang / sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang / rus pa'i rang bzhin rnams las sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten bzhengs su
346b8(mdo sde): gsol zhing / tha na sor mo tsam gyi sku 'am/ mchod rten bzhengasu gsol zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
347a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i lus thob pa rab tu thob nas/ 'dus pa dang po la ni dad pa dang ldan pas// khyim
347a2(mdo sde): nas byung nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ci lta ba bzhin du yongasu mya ngan 'da'o// tshe dang ldan pa
347a3(mdo sde): de dag ni re shig sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yino// yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bo bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi la dge ba'i
347a4(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskyed par gyur cing / bskyed du bcug ci nga / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / klags rab dang / klog du bcug pa dang / gang zhig theg pa chen
347a5(mdo sde): po'i mdo sde zab par gyur pa/ stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang / rgya cher rol pa dang / 
347a6(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa dang / yon tan 'od mchog dang / stong pa nyid kyi 'od mchog dang / phyag na rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho
347a7(mdo sde): 'phrul chen po'i tingange 'dzin dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
347a8(mdo sde): shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa'i ting 'dzin dang bai/ byang chub kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yong su 'dzin pa dang
347b1(mdo sde): glang po'i rtsal dang / sprin chen dang / sor mo'i 'breng ba dang / lang kar gshegs pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i
347b2(mdo sde): snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byams pas zhus pa dang / tshangs pas zhus pa dang / legs pa'i mtshams kyis zhus pa dang / drag shul can gyis
347b3(mdo sde): zhus pa dang / dra ba can gyi zhus pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang / rgyas pas zhus pa dang / brgya byin gyis zhus pa dang / lag na rin cen gyis zhus pa dang / mi/ 
347b4(mdo sde): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa dang / dpa' bo'i na dmakhas zhus pa dang / bu mo'i 'od dang pas zhus pa dang / bu mo rin po can ldan gyis zhus pa dang / bu mo
347b5(mdo sde): gser gyi 'od mchog gis zhus pa dang / bad sa'i rgya la po 'char byed kyis zhus pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa dang / gzugs can snying pos zhus pa
347b6(mdo sde): dang / dge ba bzang pos gang gis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu legs pa'i mtshams kyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu can dan gyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu rang gi rgyan gyis zhus pa dang / 
347b7(mdo sde): lag bzangs kyis zhus pa dang / seng ges zhus pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pas zhes pa dang / dpa' sbyin gyis zhus pa dang / gtsug na rin po ces zhus pa dang / zung gi/ 
347b8(mdo sde): mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i blos gar dang / stag rna'i rtog pa brjod pa dang / las rnam par bshad pa dang / blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang / blo gros
348a1(mdo sde): mchos bstan pa dang / dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / ma skyes dgra'i 'gyur ba dang / sred med kyi 'gyur
348a2(mdo sde): ba dang / stong par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu gling 'gyur ba dang / 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / lag na ut+pa la dang / sangs
348a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcu pa dang / chos bcu pa dang / sa bcu pa dang / 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa dang / bde ba can gyi bkod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / tshogs kyi bkod
348a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam dag me tog bsdus pa dang / 'jig rten dag/ dpas bsdus pa dang / 8byang chub sems dpa' dag pas bsdus pa dang / 
348a5(mdo sde): thams cad stegs las babs pa dang / de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad las babs pa dang / rin bo ci'i tog dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i zam
348a6(mdo sde): tog dang / mdzes pa rtsegs pa dang / rin chen skar mda' dang / rin chen sprin dang / rin chen ljon pa dang / rin chen gtsug dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / cod pan dra ba can dang / 
348a7(mdo sde): sdong po bkod pa dang / 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgya ni theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod ste/ mngon pa'i sde snod dang
348a8(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sde snod dang / mdo sde'i sde snod do// mdo sde'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lung ring po dang / gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang / phra mo'i/ 
348b1(mdo sde): lung dang ngo // de dag la ni mdo sde'i snod ces bya'o// chos mngon pa'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ba drug pa dang / yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ces bya'o// / 
348b2(mdo sde): de la 'dul ba'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi 'dul ba dang / dge slong ma'i 'dul ba dang / ma mo'i phung po dang / 'dul ba'i ma mo'i ste/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'dul
348b3(mdo sde): ba'i sde snod ces bya'o// 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te/ rtogs par brjod pa'i rabs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
348b4(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bstan pa dang / nyan thos kyis bstan pa dang / lhas bstan pa dang / 2byung ba bsdus pa dang / chos nye bar bsdus pa dang / tha na tshi/
