348b5(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig gsungs par gyur pa yang / klag par gyur pa dang / gzung bar gyur pa dang / glegs pa me bris par gyur pa dang / chos smra ba la mchod
348b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / de dag dang rang sangs rgyas la mchod par gyur pa dang / dri dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / glegs
348b7(mdo sde): bam la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos rnams g.yogs shing bkris pa dang / glegs shing mchog byas par gyur pa dang / glegs bam kha dog sna tshogs pas glegs pa ma bcings
348b8(mdo sde): pas gyur pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi thob pa rab tu thob nas/ dad pas khyim
349a1(mdo sde): spangs ste/ sgra dang / kha spu bregs nas chos gos bgos ste/ khyim nas khyim med par 'dus pa gnyis pa la rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du
349a2(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuraro// tshe dang ldan pa dag ni re shig chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no// 'di ltar 'di dag sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ dge 'du
349a3(mdo sde): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa bsgrags pa dang / dge ba la 'dzud pa dang / brgyad ston byed pa dang / gso sbyong byed pa dang / 
349a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'gron du 'bid pa dang / dge 'dun la chos ston pa/ sol ba dang / spyan 'dren pa dang / blo bur du 'dren pa dang / zla ston byed pa dang / rtag re skor byed pa dang / chos
349a5(mdo sde): sgrogs pa spyan 'dren pa dang / lo lnga ston byed pa dang / gtsug lag khong 'bul ba dang / mal stan 'dings pa dang / chos gos 'bul ba dang / 'gan 'di'i rab
349a6(mdo sde): gnas byed pa dang / sman 'bul ba dang / yo byad phul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la/ mi
349a7(mdo sde): thob nas/ 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos dgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon
349a8(mdo sde): lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag ni re shig dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yino// de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i
349b1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis rnam pa de dag rgya cher bshad nas/ shing rta la bdun srid tsam na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ dge slong de dag gi 'dun du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshe
349b2(mdo sde): 'phrul ya ma zung dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ tshe'i 'du byed dang / srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'daso// 
349b3(mdo sde): de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lus bsregs nas/ mchod rten byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
349b4(mdo sde): ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas so// rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par brgyud nas bshad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang
349b5(mdo sde): yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyuraro// zhes dga' ba rab tu bskye da pa'i phyir/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i 'phags pa dag
349b6(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad do// 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs par brjod pa rdzog s+ho// 
349b7(mdo sde): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong a dzi ta shI ra b+ha tra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// / rgya gar skad du/ rA dza ka ny+dza bA hu dI ba s+ya pra kr-i yA pra Ni dA
349b8(mdo sde): sUtra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo nus dang sman lam gyi mdo// dkon mchig gsum laM phyag tsha lo lo// sngon sangs sa/ 
350a1(mdo sde): mar me mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
350a2(mdo sde): btsun pa khyod sngon gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig spyad na/ da ltar mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te/ sku las 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
350a3(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po nyon cig/ ngas so so'i skye bo'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed
350a4(mdo sde): nas/ lus la ras bal gyi ye'u til mar gyi nang du bcos bu stong gtsugs te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sa su rgyas thams cad la/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod par
350a5(mdo sde): phul bas/ da ltar nga nyid sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ce/ sa bya bar gyur pa yino// zhes gsungs pa dang / de la rgyal po chen po shin tu yi rang ste/ de nas rgyal po
350a6(mdo sde): des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa ras bal mar gyis bcos pas dkris te me btang nas/ lag pa g.yon pa bar snang lo rkyang ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bdag
350a7(mdo sde): gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad dgongasu gsol lo// 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ 
350a8(mdo sde): gtan pa med pa'i mchod par bsngos nas/ smon lam 'debs te/ 'di skad do// mar me'i snod ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gyur cig/ snying po
350b1(mdo sde): ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur gcig/ 'od kyis ni srid pa'i rtse mo man cad nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad nas/ gzhan yang lcags ri rin po'i phyi rlab ma/ 
350b2(mdo sde): sems can rang gi las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i mun nag chen po'i nang na/ rang gi lag pa brkyang bskum yang mi mthong ba'i gnas tshun cad snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ yun/ 
350b3(mdo sde): ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji srid bzhugs pa de srid du gnas par gyur cig/ grangs ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na/ bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grags/ 
350b4(mdo sde): med pa re re'i spyan lam du gsal bar gyur cig/ mar mi 'di gzugs med pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal ba ra gyur cig/ de ltar gsol ba'i mdo la/ gzugs
350b5(mdo sde): med pa'i lha rnams mar me'i 'od kyis bskul ma thag tu/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas/ snyoms par 'a jug pa'i skye mched bzhi la grol te/ de bzhin gsheg
350b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ gzugs na
350b7(mdo sde): smod pa'i lha rnams ti nge 'dzin gyi dga' bde rtse gcig pa nyam su myong nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ mar me 'di 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyi gnas snang zhing
350b8(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur cig/ 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang / lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sems ma chags shing / rang gi sems la lta zhing bsam gtan bzhi rims kyis
351a1(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas snang shing gsal bar gyur cig/ lha ma yin gying rgyal
351a2(mdo sde): dang / khrog tum dang sems kyi gdug pa zhi nas/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan nas/ zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gling bzhi'i mi rnams
351a3(mdo sde): kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gling bzhi mi rnams kyang sdug bsngal brgyad las thar nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me
351a4(mdo sde): byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ byol song de dag gcig la gcig za da pa dang / brdeg brdung dang gsad pa dang / bkol ba'i
351a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dang / blun rmongs las thar nas/ she sa rab rnam pa gsum dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma ra me 'di gshin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal
351a6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ gshin rje rnams bsod gcod byed pa dang brdeg brdung gi las las thar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems
351a7(mdo sde): can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di pre ta'i gan su gsal bar gyur cig/ pre ta rnams kyang bkres bsgom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas/ 
351a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam ka mdzod kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zas dang skom gyis 'phongs pa'i longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
351b1(mdo sde): pa'i dbang dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di na rag rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ na rag ni sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas cha grang gi sdug bsngal pa / 
351b2(mdo sde): par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa las thar
351b3(mdo sde): nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mAr me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rol na mun nag gi nang na 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pa g.yas pa
351b4(mdo sde): brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba'i gnas su gsal b.ragyur cig/ de dag sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las/ nam ka la rang
351b5(mdo sde): gi lcags kyi sen mo yod pas brtags pas zas dang nga skom ma rnyed nas/ rang gi lus zin pa dang na/ mi la de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi
351b6(mdo sde): thugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis mun nag chen po ri 'thoms pa las thar nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar gyur cig/ gzhan yang mar me 'di klu'i gnas su snang
351b7(mdo sde): zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de rnams gti mug dang / ser sna'i mdud pa dkrol te gtong ba'i blo dang ldan zhing / nam ka lding gis 'jigs pa dang / mi tshan bye tshan
351b8(mdo sde): la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar nas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / srog 'tsho ba'i zhi gnas kyi chu'i theg le snying
352a1(mdo sde): // la gnas nas klu rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ des lto 'phye chen
352a2(mdo sde): po'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis mdzem bu gling gi spyir gnas pa'i sa bdag dang lha
352a3(mdo sde): dang klu dang / sa bdag gi rgyal po pa ti li dang / sa'i rgyal mo chen mo dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mtsho bran dang / rdzing dang khron pa la gnas pa dang / klung chen po dang klung
352a4(mdo sde): phra mo dang / chu mig dang / lu ma la gnas pa dang / gangs ri mthon po'i rgyud la gnas pa dang / ri nag po dang / g.ya' dang sha srang dang / spang ri dang / 
352a5(mdo sde): nags chen po dang / shing gcig pa dang / gtsu/ ga lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs na gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal
352a6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ de dag so so'i 'khrul pa'i rtog pa thams cad byang nas/ dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan nas
352a7(mdo sde): thar pa thob pa'i rgyu ru gyur cig/ de ltar deng mar me 'di'i yon bdag gis kyang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can
352a8(mdo sde): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dpal 'gon du gyur
352b1(mdo sde): cig rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i smon lam gyi mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skud du/ Ar+yA b+ha dra rbar bA ni d+han
352b2(mdo sde): dza bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po// 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig
352b3(mdo sde): rten na/ dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang pas phyag bgyi'o// bzang por spyod
352b4(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams ca dad yid kyis mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag
352b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhug sa pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par
352b6(mdo sde): thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang ba ri mos// de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab
352b7(mdo sde): brjod cing // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod// me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa'i gdugs mchog dang // mar// 
352b8(mdo sde): me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang // 
353a1(mdo sde): bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag kun la mchod par bgyi// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal
353a2(mdo sde): thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na// 
353a3(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyib ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs
353a4(mdo sde): rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de da ga kun gyi rjesu bdag yid rang // gang rnams phyogs
353a5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par/ sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes// mgon po de dgabadag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo bla na med par
353a6(mdo sde): bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing gi rdul bsnyed bzhugs par yang // bdag gi
353a7(mdo sde): thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjesu yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsag/ 
353a8(mdo sde): pa/ thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang
353b1(mdo sde): yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rims par sangs rgyas spyon// phyogs bcu'i gang ga'i shing rnams ji skyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su
353b2(mdo sde): dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu grang bur shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/ 
353b3(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// 'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shig/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag
353b4(mdo sde): spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su
353b5(mdo sde): slob 'gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dgapar// rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ 
353b6(mdo sde): lha'i skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang mi'i skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam bAr// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos
353b7(mdo sde): ston to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te// byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag/ de dge ma lus yongasu
353b8(mdo sde): byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang // ji ltar pad+mo chus mi chags pa bzhin// nyi zla nam
354a1(mdo sde): mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba
354a2(mdo sde): kun bkod cing // 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing // sems can dag gi spyod dang 'thun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni/ 
354a3(mdo sde): rab ston cing // ma 'ongs skal pa kun du spyod par gyur// bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'a grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni
354a4(mdo sde): sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcigab tu spyod// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de
354a5(mdo sde): dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nams kyang yid mi 'byung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon gsum
354a6(mdo sde): rtag tu bdag gis rgyal bar blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgyal tshor bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // 
354a7(mdo sde): byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyong pa yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na// / 
354a8(mdo sde): bsod nam sa ye shes tshogs ni mi bang rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul cig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der
354b1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad phyog su yang // skra tsam khyon la
354b2(mdo sde): dus gsum tshad snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal pa rgya mtsho re spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung cig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba kun
354b3(mdo sde): dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad
354b4(mdo sde): dge/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de da ga gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la// blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal par
354b5(mdo sde): thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ gang yang skal pa dus gsum tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs
354b6(mdo sde): pa sprad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis
354b7(mdo sde): 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing gi rgyan// de dag rdul cig steng du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan
354b8(mdo sde): la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi/ 
355a1(mdo sde): drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgo'i theg pa'i stobs dag dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs
355a2(mdo sde): rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang // chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab
355a3(mdo sde): thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag bsgrub par byed// las kyi stobs rnams yongasu dag byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rnams
355a4(mdo sde): kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i sto/ sa ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par
355a5(mdo sde): byed cing // sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgo/ chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byas nas/ ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod
355a6(mdo sde): brgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cig/ bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par brgya
355a7(mdo sde): gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi// byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams// bzang por spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun bdag gis
355a8(mdo sde): ma lus rdzogs par gyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu ba po// gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba de dag
355b1(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnams dag cing // spyod pa rnams ngag zhing rnams yongs dag pa// bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar// de 'drar
355b2(mdo sde): bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa rnamasu mi skyo bar// 
355b3(mdo sde): de'i bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // 
355b4(mdo sde): de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam pa// sems nam lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam las dang
355b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha/ 'a yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing / rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba
355b6(mdo sde): rnams la phul// lha dang mi'i bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog
355b7(mdo sde): gi rjesu rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pas ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang sprod smon la 'di btab pas// des
355b8(mdo sde): ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong // de dag snyed pa rab rnyed bde bar/ 
356a1(mdo sde): mtsho// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs// kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// 'tshams
356a2(mdo sde): med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bzang spong smon lam 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ 
356a3(mdo sde): ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum po kun
356a4(mdo sde): na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can phani phyin/ de 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab
356a5(mdo sde): tu bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon la ma 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi// de yi
356a6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed gcig/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te/ 
356a7(mdo sde): de dag gi ni rje su bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/ 
356a8(mdo sde): bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun yang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te// 
356b1(mdo sde): mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon sum gyur par shog/ de
356b2(mdo sde): dag ma lus bdag gis yongasu bskang // 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las
356b3(mdo sde): skyes snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba
356b4(mdo sde): phrog brgya yis// blo'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnam ras su yang // sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bton pa yi// 
356b5(mdo sde): dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad cig ga/ cig la thams cad 'byor par shog/ gang yang bzang
356b6(mdo sde): spong smon lam gton pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des// 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog/ 
356b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mait+ti pra Ni d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byam/ 
356b8(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
357a1(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshe nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gcugs te thal mo sgra
357a2(mdo sde): nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong lha mig ldan pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
357a3(mdo sde): dang yang // nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshalo// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab bston la// rga shi med par 'dren mdzad pa// byang chub sems
357a4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag bdag gis bshags par bgyi// 
357a5(mdo sde): bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshe gas ni skyed pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gis byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu
357a6(mdo sde): ngag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yid rang bas// de la bdag kyang yid rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 
357a7(mdo sde): bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas/ 
357a8(mdo sde): pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par skul ma 'deb// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// 
357b1(mdo sde): srog chags kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/ chos rje chen po'i sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas/ 
357b2(mdo sde): su 'chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur pa'i// sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcing dag la// rkang gnyis mchog
357b3(mdo sde): rnams gzigasu gsol// sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol ba
357b4(mdo sde): shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // gang drag 'das dang ma byon pa// de dag rjesu bdag slob cing // byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug
357b5(mdo sde): rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyi/ da shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis na// bla med byang chub rig gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang / 
357b6(mdo sde): bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos rnams rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar// sems can ma
357b7(mdo sde): mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin par yi// dngos po kun la mi
357b8(mdo sde): gnas par// sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog/ dngos
358a1(mdo sde): po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing // tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// 
358a2(mdo sde): rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang na me 'am chu// rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa khra
358a3(mdo sde): ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi// bstan spro le lo ma mchis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus
358a4(mdo sde): sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyum lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro raba'i ting 'dzin dang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
358a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par tha raM pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam ba nyid dang yang // rig gsum mngon gsum bgyis// 
358a6(mdo sde): pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
358a7(mdo sde): kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar sprad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// sa bcu la
358a8(mdo sde): ni rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas// gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas// theg pa bde ba 'jug pa
358b1(mdo sde): bde ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yi no// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzog s+ho// / 
358b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ byang chub dam pa'i rje su mos pa'i smon lam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams na dus gsum gyi// ye shes yin tan thugs rje tshad med
358b3(mdo sde): cing / dpag med lnga phung rdzogs te bla med pas// bdud kyi sde bcom legs pa drug dang ldan// mkhyen pas ci bzhin gsungs bzhin de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs
358b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom skye dgus mchod par 'os// yang dag rdzo dgas par sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// rig pa'i blo gsal khyad par zhabs dang bcas/ 
358b5(mdo sde): bgrong mchog gnas su bde gshegs legs pa ba rnyes// 'jig rten 'di dag dngos po ci bzhi na gzigs// skye bu cis 'dul thabs kyis kha lo// 
358b6(mdo sde): sbyar// srid pa'i mthar phyin lha mi ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'di// gzhal yas tshogs kyi yon ton mchog brnyes nas// don dam
358b7(mdo sde): dbyings la mnga' mdzad chos kyi rje// srid gsum rmongs las 'khor ba'i ston sel phyir// dbang gyur gzhan gyis rnyed min thos par dka'// dka' las rnyed
358b8(mdo sde): pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas sangs rgyas mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// dgongs pa lhad med snying po mdo yi sde// bkri ba'i don phyir tshig bzangs dbyangs
359a1(mdo sde): kyis bsnyad// spro ba bskyed ces lung bstan 'phags pa'i gsung // don gsal bslab bder 'dra ba sdebs tshig su bcad// yul gyi dgongs pa gzigs te/ 
359a2(mdo sde): ched du gzigs// gleng gzhis rgyus byas brlab pa'i dbyibs rnams bstan// bshad pa go sla dpes mtshon rtogs pas brjod// yon tan mchog dang nyes pa'i skyon bstan phyir
359a3(mdo sde): sngon byung gtam dang thub pas mdzad pa'i rabs// rgyas par gsung dang mkhyen pas cho 'phrul rmad// ci bzhin gtan la phab cing bstan pa'i sde// rnam grol khyad par bsgrubs
359a4(mdo sde): pa lam gyi chos// mi yo zhi ba dag pa don dam dbyings// bstan pas tshangs mar bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid 'di// zab mo brtag dka' thub pas ched du gsungs// sgrib
359a5(mdo sde): sel yang dag don shes chags med blos// bla med ga/ nas su 'degs pa'i theg chen phyir// shes rlom/ gzhan gyi gzhung la yod mi srid// mi srid yod pa bla/ 
359a6(mdo sde): med dkon mchog ste// de bas chos nyid mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// ston pa mchog gi gsung las skyes pa ste// ma skyes chos nyid ston pa'i ye shes zab// bzang po// 
359a7(mdo sde): spyod la brtson pa'i yon tan che// gnyis min dbyer med mthong zhes ma chags blo// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub ces snying rje'i bdag/ 'phongs la yid bzhin gtong ba'i
359a8(mdo sde): rin chen gter// sdug bsngal nad rnams gso ba'i sman pa mchog/ rgyal sras gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' dang // shes rab gsum gyi bden pa'i phyogs bsgoms
359b1(mdo sde): te/ bden mthong rims kyis nyon mongs mthar spangs nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir// rtogs pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum las 'das// dbang / 
359b2(mdo sde): rab ni dul ba'i spyod lam mdzes// lus dang ngag yid skyon med rnam dag zhes// lha min yon tan khyad du mi 'khor ba'i// slob dang mi slob 'phags pa'i gang zag
359b3(mdo sde): brgyad// bla ma'i khyad par mthong mthu gzhan dag kyang // dam pa'i sa la 'jug pa spro ba che// dad mos dge bas 'tsho ba'i dka' thub can// so sor thar pa'i sdom la tshul
359b4(mdo sde): bzhin gnas// blo zab grol gnas tshul chen dge 'du ngan 'di// shes gsal dge bas bsgrub pa'i spyod pra zab// dang mos btul bar zhugs pa'i dka' thub
359b5(mdo sde): brtan// yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas shes 'dus pa'i mchog/ rnam dag spyod pas bdag gzhan don pa/ sgrub phyir// bsgrub byed gzhan gyi tshul gyis 'di ma
359b6(mdo sde): brnyad// bstan min nges par 'phags pa'i dkon mchog ste/ de bas dge 'dun mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// bsod nams gtor tshor legs pa bsam yas kyang // 
359b7(mdo sde): rnam dag sems kyis dang de 'ol phyogasu// bstod pa'i cha tsam brjod cing phyag 'tshal nas// 'dus ma byas pa'i mchod pa rnam dag pas// ma byung ma skyes stong pa'i
359b8(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de// gnyis min dbyer med rang rig snyoms pa'i yul// chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rab 'brel cing // mtshan ma med pa'i stobs kyis grub pa yi// ye shes mnyam
360a1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyang // thos pa'i rjes tsam yid kyis der mos te// yang dag nyid kyi snying po dag pas mchod// byang chub dam pa'i spyod pa dpag ya/ 
360a2(mdo sde): pas// nyon mongs ma 'dres 'jig rten gsum la 'dren// rin chen dbyig bkod rnam par dag pa'i zhing // 'byor pa tshad med lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// kun tu bzang
360a3(mdo sde): po sprod pas thob pa yi// bsod nams khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyang // dad pa'i shugs kyis yang dag 'dir dmigs te// tshad med yang bzhin phun sum tshogs
360a4(mdo sde): paso mchod// 'jig rten dge ba'i mchod pa mngon sum pa// me tog byug pa phye ma spos chus mchod// dri bsung mur me rol mo sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan pa ngan
360a5(mdo sde): 'phreng ba bla res gdugs// rgyan dang na bza' gding ba/ rin chen dkor// sman dang zhal zas yo byad mi za// da bas// mdzes par brgyan pa'i gnas dang sa
360a6(mdo sde): gzhir bcas// skye bo bzhon pa khyu mchog rkang gnyis ldan// legs par sprad pa'i tshogs kyis bskyed pa yi// bde 'gro snying pas 'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyang / gus pa'i tshul
360a7(mdo sde): gyis mngon sum 'dir dmigs te// dgos pa sna tshogs mi yul 'byor pas mchod// mchod gnas gsum la 'os pas mchod bgyis te// snying rje byams ldan chags med
360a8(mdo sde): snyoms pa'i blos// sbyin par 'os dang phongs dang mngon sum gyis// 'brel pa'i sems can kun la sbyin pa bstabs// dngos po chung yang dmigs pa cher bskyed de// gus pa'i
360b1(mdo sde): tshul gyis yang dag mchod bgyis nas// brtse ldan mgon med skyabs kyi mngon sum du// sngon gyi nyes pa ma lus bshags pa ni// thog ma med pa'i srid pa ci tsam nas// dngos med
360b2(mdo sde): dngos por brtags pas yid bslad de// ma nor bde ba rnams kyi lam ma mthong // dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan tshul ma shes// rgyu dang 'bras bur ma rtogs don nor te// lus kyi
360b3(mdo sde): spyod pa ma dag sdig to bgyis// ngag gis tshig 'tshal smras pas ngan du brjod// sems kyis blo nor logs par bsags pa yis// bde 'gro mtho ris gnas dang skye gzhan gyi// 
360b4(mdo sde): los ngan sdig pa mi 'chab 'dir bshag so// yang dag rig dpa'i skal dang ldan bzhin du// dge ba'i bshes pa/ nyen ring du bral gyur te// sdig pa'i grogs kyis rtag
360b5(mdo sde): du nyer bstan pas// le lo rang nyam dbang du bdag spyodacing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la g.yengs pas na// mgus nyan sems bsgoms la brtson zhan te// bla
360b6(mdo sde): med dam pa'i lam la sgrib pa yi// nan tan nyams pa mi 'chab 'dir bshag so// mtshan ma mang pos rig pa'i blo g.yengs nas// dngos med dngos por rtog cing gnyis la 'jug
360b7(mdo sde): don dam yang dag mtha' la blo zhan te// mi gnas dbyings la ye shes rmugs pas na// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sdug bsngal mi zad ces// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub la g.yel
360b8(mdo sde): 'gyur bas// bla med sangs rgyas sa la sgrib pa yi// shes rab zhan po'i mi 'chab 'dir bshag so// ci ltar sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor 'gyur ltar// thog mer byang chub mcho
361a1(mdo sde): tu sems skyed nas// pha rol phyin bcu rnam par rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nams ye shes dpag tu med par bsgrubs// ma 'dres stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes
361a2(mdo sde): nas/ mngon par byang chub bdud kyi sde rnams btul// chos kyi 'khor lo gsum gi tshul bzhin bskor// mtha' gnyis spangs phyir mi gnas mya ngan 'das// bcabs pa med bzhin
361a3(mdo sde): pun tshogs la sogs// bla med sangs rgyas yon tan dpag yas kyis// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ci rnyed pa// de dag yongs la rje su yi rang ngo // bla ma mchod byed thos pas mi
361a4(mdo sde): ngoms shing // shes rab gsal bas ma skyes chos nyid mthong // mtha' la mi gnas sdug bsngal bzod bya da ste// brtser ldan snyoms pas 'gro ba'i skyabs la brtsom
361a5(mdo sde): sa dang pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nam sa ye shes dpag tu med pa bsgrubs// bla med dam pa'i lam la spro ba che// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba byang chub
361a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang // blo zhib gsal bas rten 'grel rgyud bsgoms te// bskal pa brgya snyed yon tan tshogs bsags pa'i// cho 'phrul spyod lam tshul gyis sgrol byed cing // ma bstan
361a7(mdo sde): rkyen las rig pa'i nga rgyal dang // dad phyir bla ma'i lung bsgrubs thos 'dzin ces// gang zag chos dang dngos pos rnam brtags pas// 'khor ba'i zug rngu skyon dag spang rigs
361a8(mdo sde): la// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mchog bgrod 'os zhes// shes rab ting 'dzin blos dpyad rab bsgrubs pas// sdug bsngal ci bzhin brtags te kun 'byung spangs// 'gog pa'i legs
361b1(mdo sde): pa mthong ste lam rnams bsgoms// de tshul goms byas bden mthong khyad par lam// mthong dang bsgoms pa'i legs pa rim bzhin du// 'khor ba'i zug rngu sngon dag yang rig
361b2(mdo sde): la mya ngan 'das pa'i bde gnas rab bsgrub pas// dgra bcom la sogs skyes bu chen po brgyad// byang chub nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i rnams// yon tan sna tshogs
361b3(mdo sde): brjod par dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs par ci snyed pa// de dag yongs la rje su yi rang ngo // so so'i skye bo dge slong ci snyed pa// dge bcu sprad pa'i tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// 
361b4(mdo sde): mtho ris gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa bsgrubs pas// rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod la sogs// 'orog rten dge ba'i skye bo grangs med kyis// yon tan sna chog
361b5(mdo sde): brjod par dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs/ pa ji srid pa// de dag yongs la rje su yi rang ngo // na mkha'i dbyings 'dra tshad gzung dka' ba yi// rgyud
361b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu mchog la yi rang nas// legs pa'i tshogs la rje su rab mos te// dad pas sems bskyed yi dam bcas pa ni// ci ltar sangs rgyas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// / 
361b7(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la// dad de tshul bzhin phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// rnam dag sems kyis dam pa'i rgyu byas nas// gzhal yas tshogs kyi dbyings la
361b8(mdo sde): khyab pa'i sems// 'jig rten rab 'byam kun la 'jug pa'i blos// sems can yongs la snyoms par khyab pa'i yid// bsod nams dpe mi bsgrub kyi 'byung gnas mchog
362a1(mdo sde): ye shes dpag yas mngon sum grub pa'i rgyus// ston pa rdul skyed shin tu mnyes 'gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis dam pa'i sems bskyed de// dad dang
362a2(mdo sde): tesnying rje brtson 'grus rab brtul nas// tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab thogs med blos// bzang po spyod pa bsgrubs te bsod nams bskang // chos kyi dbyings dang bsnyam
362a3(mdo sde): te ye shes 'jug/ namakha'i tshad kyis gzhal te sems can bsgral// 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs 'jig rteni skabs la sogs// byang chub chen por bya bar rigs pa
362a4(mdo sde): dang / ma lus bdag gis bya bar dam bca'o// bla med se mas bskyed dpag yas dam bcas nas// dge ba ci snyed mchog tu bsngo ba ni// mchod 'os bsod nams
362a5(mdo sde): zhing dag ma lus la// dad de mchod cing phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// brtser ldan ma chags sems kyis sprin gsum gtong // sdig bshags yi rang
362a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed byang chub snying por bsngo// ci snyed legs par spyod pa sdud pa'i rkyen// dge bo'i rtsa ba ma lus kun bsngos nas// rtse gcig
362a7(mdo sde): sems kyis dmigs te smon pa ni// 'dir spyad brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di nyid kyis// legs par khyad par grub pa'i rgyu byas te// rgyal pos bdag chos kyi skyong
362a8(mdo sde): ba dang // bdag cag 'khor bcas 'thu na spyod ma lus kun// da ltar gnas pa'i lus gnas 'di la sogs// 'khor ba'i rgyun na nam bdag gnas kyi tshe// chos
362b1(mdo sde): dang lugs kyi don rnams ci la yang // skyon dang bar cad gcol ba gnod med cing // lus dang sems bde 'byor pa yid bzhin te// snying rje byams pas gzhan la pa
362b2(mdo sde): byed cing // ma skyes ma gos tshang du skye min pa'i// ngan song gsum dang smad pa'i mi lus rnams// mtho ris skyon dang bgegs kyis sa la sogs// sdug bsngal gsungs
362b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rigs gang du yang // mi skye mi myong spyod par mi 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sku gsung rgyun tu mthong thos te// dad las tshul bzhin sdom las rig pa gsal// chos
362b4(mdo sde): dang zang zing tshogs ldan ma chags blos// brtse phyir sbyin gsum lhur byed phan 'dogs shing // mgo/ na dang skyabs med rten du bdag gyur te// lha mi'i tshul
362b5(mdo sde): du 'tsho ba gzhan las len// byang chub dam pa'i thab sa dang blo rdzogs te// sku gsum lhun gyis grub ste/ sangs rgyas nas// sngon gyi dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas
362b6(mdo sde): kyis// sems bskyed rgya chen smon lam btab pa'i mthus// 'jig rten bde ba can gyi gnas mchog 'dir// 'byor pa dpag yas tshad med longs spyod cing // 'od 'bar sku
362b7(mdo sde): mchog mi g.yo ba zhugs zhing du// mtshan tsam thos pas bde gnas thob la sogs// 'jig rten khyad par phan dgu skyabs mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'od dpag med par
362b8(mdo sde): gyur pa bzhin// khams gsum rnam par grags pa'i don grub ste// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du grub par smon// de bzhin rgyud drug lam la gnas pa yi// nyon mongs
363a1(mdo sde): dbang gyur sems can ji snyed kun// 'khor ba'i ris na so so'i rkyen bzhin du// gtso med lus sems rtag tu bde bzhin gnas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
363a2(mdo sde): mchog tu bsnyen gyur te// chos nyid dbyings la rig pa'i blo rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa'i sems bskyed mchog grub ste// bde gshegs yang dag sa la gnas par smon// / 
363a3(mdo sde): lugs bzhin dngos 'dun bdag gis 'dir smras pas// skyon med rtse gcig dam pas rab bstan pa'i// bla ma gsung gi cha tsam 'ol phyogasu// ne tse ci bzhin tshig bzlas brjod mod
363a4(mdo sde): kyis/ rgyal ba'i yon tan la sogs dpag yas la// dbadag 'dra'i blos dpags tshig 'di 'khrul srid kyi/ das// gang nongs bla ma yongs la bzod par gsol// byang
363a5(mdo sde): chub dam pa'i rje su mos pa'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ a gra tsar+ya pra ni d+hA na na/ bod skad du/ 
363a6(mdo sde): mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs
363a7(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la 'dud// de dag la ni rjed cing mchod par bgyi// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag rtog/ chos kyi blo gros
363a8(mdo sde): dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung // dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud// thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i// 
363b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba// mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi// rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongasu gsol// sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis
363b2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags// de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// shAkya thub dang
363b3(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med// de dag gis ni 'phrin las yongs spangs dang // 'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing bshags gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshag
363b4(mdo sde): pabar bgyi// thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa ga/ dang // byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba 'tshal// dran song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig/ mi khom 'joms par
363b5(mdo sde): bgyid cing rgyu bar shog/ sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med ma nga' bdag dang // de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma sgron// de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar// 
363b6(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang // phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang // de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang // shes rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs
363b7(mdo sde): kun la// byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyis thams cad la// byang chub yon tan don du yi rang
363b8(mdo sde): ngos 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul// phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang // de dag tshangs brgya ji ltar gsol/ 
364a1(mdo sde): bltar// rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig/ rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog/ 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg
364a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ mi rnams thams cad mchog dang blo med pa// 'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang // las dge
364a3(mdo sde): rnams la yi rang gang lags dang // sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang // rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang // bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci
364a4(mdo sde): bgyis pa// lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung // bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid par 'gyur bag/ nga // thams cad skye dgu sman slad stsal par bgyi// 
364a5(mdo sde): ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas// / stsal pa legs par sprul cing legs rgyas pa// de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad stsal// 'gro
364a6(mdo sde): kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ bdag gis 'gro la stsal pa gang lags pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa// theg po chen por yongasu bsngo// 
364a7(mdo sde): par bgyi// bdag la byang chub 'bras bu 'grub par shog/ mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams// 'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog/ 'jam dpal gyi ni/ 
364a8(mdo sde): rje su slob bgyid cing // byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi// mi cig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i// tshor ba thams cad bdag gis myong 'gyur bar// bskal
364b1(mdo sde): pa du mar bdag ni spro bar bgyi// 'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog/ sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang // dud 'gro'i gnas rnams dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal
364b2(mdo sde): dang / mi'i gnas rnams mi'i sdug bsngal dang // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dag/ bdag la bar gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog/ rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag dang // sems
364b3(mdo sde): can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang // smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog/ bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag ni
364b4(mdo sde): nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog/ byang chub mchog ni ba dag gis thob bar du// bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro ba dar shog/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam rdzog s+ho// 
364b5(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba pa na de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus teg tan la phab pa// / 'phags pa
364b6(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i yongasu bsngo ba// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// phyogs bcu
364b7(mdo sde): brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongasu
364b8(mdo sde): gsol// gang bdag gi skye ba 'di 'am// skye ba gzhan du khyim pa 'am// rab tu byung bas/ ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis
365a1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba shes pa'am/ mi shes pa 'am/ bsams
365a2(mdo sde): pa'am/ ma bsams pa'am/ dran pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'dod chags kyi dbang ngam/ zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/ gti mug gi dbang ngam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma lags pa dang 'brel/ 
365a3(mdo sde): pa'i dbang ngam/ mi shes pa'i dbang ngam/ yul gyi dbang ngam/ dus su skyes pa'i dbang ngam/ yang dag par tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ sbyor bas tshul khrims
365a4(mdo sde): 'chal pa 'am/ dngos pos tshul khrims 'chal pa 'a/ nam/ lus kyi rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam de bzhi dang / yid kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang / 
365a5(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon 'am/ bla ma gzhan dag la nyes pa ba gyis pa'am/ sems can gyi khams lta ba log pa
365a6(mdo sde): la btsud pa 'am/ sems can yang dag sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pa'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams log par bsngo bas yongasu bsngos pa 'am/ de bzhin
365a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa smras pa 'am/ chos ma yin pa chos su bstan pa'am/ chos chos ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar bstan
365a8(mdo sde): pa'am/ 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ lam ma yin pa lam du bstan pa 'am/ lam lam ma yin par bstan pa'am/ sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas// 
365b1(mdo sde): bdag mi dge ba'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i phyogs la sems yang dag par mi gnas pa 'am/ sgrib pa gzhan gyis bsgribs nas/ blo g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i nongs pa
365b2(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag thams cad nongs pa bshags par bgyi'o// ji ltar byis pa/ ji ltar blun pa/ ji ltar mi gsal ba/ ji ltar mi mkhas pa/ ji ltar 'chal pa'i
365b3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rang bzhin can/ de ltar nongs pa nongs par bshegs par bgyi'o// nongs pa nonges par bshags nas/ phyis sdom pa blangs shing yang de ltar mi bgyi ste/ 
365b4(mdo sde): de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// yang sang ngas rgyas bcom ldam 'das de dag bdag la dgongasu// gsol/ gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub
365b5(mdo sde): sems dpar gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
365b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ chos kyi dung kun nas
365b7(mdo sde): bus/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad/ chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la/ sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud/ dam pa'i chos kyi
365b8(mdo sde): tshul rab tu bstan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos rnam
366a1(mdo sde): nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing / rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur
366a2(mdo sde): zhing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag le snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis son rnams kyi seni dmyal bas
366a3(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa
366a4(mdo sde): dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzug das bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang
366a5(mdo sde): rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha
366a6(mdo sde): ma phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag tham
366a7(mdo sde): cad la rje su yi rang ste/ rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na mo mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / 
366a8(mdo sde): gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' ltar dag cing yong su dag pa'i rje su yi rang/ 
366b1(mdo sde): pas rje su yi rang ngo // gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thug su chud nas/ chos la dges pa dang / chos la nges par dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba tham
366b2(mdo sde): cad yongs su skyob pa dang / yon thams cad yongasu sbyong zhing yongasu sngo ba dang / chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / 
366b3(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / dam bcas pa dang / smon lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / ston pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes pa
366b4(mdo sde): yang dag par thugs su chu da chud nas kyang sems ca na gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas/ thug das khral chung ngur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing / chos
366b5(mdo sde): ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag skul ma 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bad ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i
366b6(mdo sde): tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi dung
366b7(mdo sde): kun nas bud du gsol// chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab
366b8(mdo sde): tu dgod du gsol/ gang dag tshe la dbang ba/ sprul pa la dbang ba/ byin gyis brlabs la dbang ba/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/ sems can 'dul ba'i tsho gas smin par
367a1(mdo sde): mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa dang / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar thugs gnol zhing / sku tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la
367a2(mdo sde): bdag gsol ba 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tsho gas mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi
367a3(mdo sde): rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab du gsol/ gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis
367a4(mdo sde): shing bsags pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis ba gyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa nga la rje su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya
367a5(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgo/ mas pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos dang / tha na sems can gcig gi seMs gcig gis sems pa dang bag
367a6(mdo sde): tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
367a7(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / 
367a8(mdo sde): rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa
367b1(mdo sde): dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / 
367b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam
367b3(mdo sde): par thar pa dang / tingange 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 
367b4(mdo sde): bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs/ 
367b5(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang // 
367b6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
367b7(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang / shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang / spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / namakha'i
367b8(mdo sde): mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin po che nyid dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa/ 
368a1(mdo sde): ba gang lags pa de dag/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig/ gang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis
368a2(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
368a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs
368a4(mdo sde): dbyung bar bgyi'o// mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o// sman pa dang bde ba 'i mtha'i gnas kyi bzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste/ de
368a5(mdo sde): ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
368a6(mdo sde): rdzogs s+ho// // !// 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya
368a7(mdo sde): ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'
368a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag sdig pa thams cad so sor gshagaso// bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo // sangs
368b1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'deb so// bsod nams thams cad sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du yong sung / 
368b2(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis/ bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa ji ltar yongasu bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yongasu/ 
368b3(mdo sde): bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des gang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa mi dge ba nyes pa byas pa dang / log par smras pa dang / ngan du bsams pa dang / 
368b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam dpar smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs te/ kun
368b5(mdo sde): nas dkris pa bdag nyid dang / gzhan dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / ra bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mtshal ba dang / dbang po
368b6(mdo sde): dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang // 
368b7(mdo sde): bsten par bya ba dang / bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul
368b8(mdo sde): bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa mi sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing / g.yogs te/ kun nas bkris pa rnams
369a1(mdo sde): sems can 'dul ba dang / bdag 'dul ba dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / gnyis 'dul ba dang / 'jam pos 'dul ba dang / khro bas 'dul ba dang / btang snyoms
369a2(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba dang / sdigs pas 'dul ba dang / bskrad pas 'dul ba dang / smad pas 'dul ba dang / sten pa dang / snyen pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas 'dul ba dang / 
369a3(mdo sde): chos bshad pas 'dul ba dang / 'dzum bstan pas 'dul ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog gis 'dul ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pas 'dul ba dang / 
369a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ba/ rtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pas 'dul ba dang / dang // 
369a5(mdo sde): bo dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / sgom pas 'dul ba dang / 'dus ba gang dang gang gis/ sems can gyi khams 'dul ba/ 
369a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma mtshal ba dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / tinge 'dzin gyi rgyu dang / dmigs pa'i rgyu dang / bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang / zhi
369a7(mdo sde): gnas kyi rgyu dang / lhag mthong gi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang / zag pa zad pa'i rgyu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba
369a8(mdo sde): dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du mi 'gyur ba dang / snang ba skyes pa de dag nub par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa
369b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog/ 
369b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skye bo la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnyen la rnam par rtog pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / lam stan dang / 
369b3(mdo sde): na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad la rnam par rtog pa'i sems la kun nas gnas pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang / gzugs ngan pa dang / dbang
369b4(mdo sde): chung ba dang / rigs dma' ba dang / longs spyod chu dang ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa dang / sems na na dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
369b5(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma da nga / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba nyam su myong ba
369b6(mdo sde): dang / smon lam log pa la dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam ma rtogs dang / gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis bsgribs shing / kun nas dkris pa'i sems can rnam/ 
369b7(mdo sde): kyis rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la smin nas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing / rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi khams
369b8(mdo sde): ji tsam pa dang / chos kyi khams ji tsam pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khams ji tsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ji tsam pa dang / gnyis su med pa ji tsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid
370a1(mdo sde): ji tsas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid ji tsam pa dang / 'dod chags dang / ke sdang dang / gti mug gi khams ji cas pa dang / 'khor bar dogs pa dang / 'don
370a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam ba de tsam du sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams gang yin pa ded/ 
370a3(mdo sde): la smin nas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol shing rnam par dag par gyur cig/ bdag gis ci tsam du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing / 
370a4(mdo sde): bsags pa gang lags pa de sems can thams cad la yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bdag ni 'dod chags la chags/ zhe sdang gis gdungs/ gti mug
370a5(mdo sde): gis rmongs te/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'inyon mongs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / ldan nas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar
370a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal/ ma mthong / ma rig ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thugs su chud pas ji ltar
370a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dang 'thun par yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar
370a8(mdo sde): sems can 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang / ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / ji ltar sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang
370b1(mdo sde): dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
370b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
370b3(mdo sde): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// 
370b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su bsngo ba dang / gnyis da su med pas yongasu bsngo ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskabs pa'i yongasu bsngo bas yongasu bsngo
370b5(mdo sde): bar bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan ga sum du'o// sems can gang zhig gang dang gang gi sa 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i sems rnam par rtog
370b6(mdo sde): pa med pas/ bdag mthong bar 'gyur zhing / ji lta ji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdag gi lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi
370b7(mdo sde): las rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig/ dus ji lta ba dang / yul ji lta ba dang / sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med par
370b8(mdo sde): ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa thams cad yongasu skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongasu bsngo ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi
371a1(mdo sde): mkhan po bid d+ya kar pra b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhunus te gtan la phab
371a2(mdo sde): pa// bod skad du/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongasu bsngo ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten
371a3(mdo sde): sman slad du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung thub dbang thugs rje ldan rnams la// bdag gis bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal// chags dang zhe sdang
371a4(mdo sde): gti mug dbang gis ni// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ci sogs pa// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi
371a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzod gang dang / byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams da nga // gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi theg can dang // 'jig
371a6(mdo sde): rten bsod nams de la yi rang ngo // byang chub snying por thog mar gang sangs rgyas// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spun mnga' ba// sangs rgyas zla med mtha' yas de dag la// chos
371a7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskur// phung po ma lus mya ngan 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang gzhad mi dang lha'i lha// mgon po de dag ji snyed sman slad du// 
371a8(mdo sde): bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad par gsol// phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang // bskul ba dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang // de bzhin yi rang
371b1(mdo sde): bsod nams ci bsags pa// byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gi bsod nams dam pa 'dis rtag tu// byang chub sems ni brjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs
371b2(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ mi khom gnod pa brgyad po spong bar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus brgyan
371b3(mdo sde): dang // rtag tu skye dran sems ni mi rmongs dang // rab des pha rol phyin pa brtson gyur cig/ dbang phyug mi rdzi chos kyi dbang phyug dang // yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur med
371b4(mdo sde): shog/ g.yog 'khor mang po 'thun par ldan pa dang // / bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad rnam dag blo dang ldan// cho ga yon
371b5(mdo sde): tan dag la dga' bar shog/ bsam gtan mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ dbang bcu dag la bdage dbang byed gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
371b6(mdo sde): lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang myur thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag tshogs kyi rnyed pa rnyed gyur cig/ sems can thams
371b7(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa yi// byang chub tu ni smon lam myur 'debs shog/ de la dam bcas pas ni brtan gyur cing // byang chub thob min don gzhan byed ma gyur// lus kun
371b8(mdo sde): dbang po dag pa rab rgyas shing // nad med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral// tshe ring zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan// sdig las zlog cing dge las 'jug gyur cig/ ser sna bram
372a1(mdo sde): zhing zang zing med chos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje che dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' bde ba
372a2(mdo sde): gshegs gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs bsngo rgyal po la// des ni rang gi
372a3(mdo sde): bsod nams yongasu bsngo// bde gshegs kun tu bzang dang mkhyen pa dag/ kun tu bzang po bsngo dge ji lta bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyod dang // rgyal ba
372a4(mdo sde): dam pa kun tu bzang por shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ yongasu bsngo ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgyu gar skad du/ sastu yan gA tha/ bong skad du/ 
372a5(mdo sde): bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigasu bcad pa// na mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// lha zhig nye ba ra 'ongs nas su/ 'jig rten mgon la zhus byas te/ 
372a6(mdo sde): gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bdag zhus bcom ldan bka' stsal gsol// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// gang
372a7(mdo sde): gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// de ni lha khyod legs par nyon// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang // g.yo ba med cing rab brtan dang // gang gi tshul khrims dge gyur
372a8(mdo sde): pa/ 'di la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma dang bu// chung ma de bzhin mngag gzhug la// rtag tu rim gro legs byas pa// de la kun tu bde legs
372b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu dgra bcom la// yon rnams shin tu brtan byas dang // lha rnams la yang bya bsgo ba// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag/ 
372b2(mdo sde): dang ni// yid kyis nyes pa byas med cing // gang zhig gnas gsum bsdams gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// 
372b3(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms shing // dpag tu med la mi 'khrug pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir// bde ba 'tho/ 
372b4(mdo sde): byed 'phags pa'i lam// yan lag brgyad pa sus// bsgoms pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad stong nyid du// gang gis rtag tu
372b5(mdo sde): rab mthong zhing // der yang sems can gnas gyu ra pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang dag dri ma med chos rnams// lus kyis mngon sum
372b6(mdo sde): byas nas sprad// dgra bcom rnam par grol sems rnams// de dag rtag tu bde logs 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang // 
372b7(mdo sde): shes pa mi 'jigs skyes gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgon// yang srid zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gang la khong du chu
372b8(mdo sde): mdzad pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshig su bcad pa rdzog s+ho/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / ni
373a1(mdo sde): len dra ba d+hi dang / shu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ sasti ga thA/ bdund du/ 
373a2(mdo sde): bde legs kyi tshig su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// lce zhig nye bar 'ongs nas su// lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa chen// ci zhig
373a3(mdo sde): smras na bde legs 'gyur// lha'i tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa// gang gis rtag tu brjod byed la// nga'i bde legs 'gyur de nyon// 'jig rten 'di
373a4(mdo sde): dang gzhan dang mtho ris na// rin chen rgya chen mcho ngag ni gang yod pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin che dan la// cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod// ngo mtshar
373a5(mdo sde): shin tu rmad 'byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog ci ltar nga'i de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde leg
373a6(mdo sde): shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang // shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te// de mngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med// ngo
373a7(mdo sde): mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ rgyal
373a8(mdo sde): bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa// de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur// 
373b1(mdo sde): mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog
373b2(mdo sde): dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gyi nom pa// 'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi 'os// shes rab dam pa chos kyi dam pa mchog mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di na bcom ldan cig
373b3(mdo sde): ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs// 
373b4(mdo sde): shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang // mtha' yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsung ba// ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin de dag
373b5(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'a jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ 
373b6(mdo sde): bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ci ltar sgo gtan brtan zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa gzhi mthong bden gnas pa
373b7(mdo sde): 'ang // 'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yos// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
373b8(mdo sde): mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ thams cad zil gnan kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan// kun
374a1(mdo sde): gyi dam pa 'jigs pa kun dang bral// bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di na bcom ldan cig/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
374a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sred pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med// skyon med 'jigs pa kun las
374a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol// shin tu dkon zhing gya nom nges par 'byung // shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten
374a4(mdo sde): mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i// 'dren rnams
374a5(mdo sde): mthong ste gang dag bag yod cing // bden pa rin chen rna mas la dogs bral ba// de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyi se mi leni// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// 
374a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa rnams kyi dam pa don dam mkhyen// 
374a7(mdo sde): mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtsegs// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chung rtogs// shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byu
374a8(mdo sde): dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten rin chen mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ 'dun pa skyes nas rnal
374b1(mdo sde): 'byor ldan gyur cing // gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhing // gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhing der reg/ 'di la der reg grangasu phyin mi 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med
374b2(mdo sde): de// dge 'dun gang zhig 'jig rten rin chen mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bden pa mthos pa brjed pas rgyalam na// gal
374b3(mdo sde): te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur cing // de ni de 'chab pa yi 'os min te// chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyiraro// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig
374b4(mdo sde): rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ lha dang bcadas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad ni// sangs rgyas dang ni lhag
374b5(mdo sde): pa'am mtshungs pa med// lha dang mi'i ston pa bla na med/ ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
374b6(mdo sde): rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis// nags khrod chos kyi dam pa
374b7(mdo sde): gang gsungs pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa'am lhag pa med// 'di la der reg grangs su phyin mi 'brang // ngo mtshar shin tu rmad 'byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen
374b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas meng na// rims nad med cing 'jig med mya ngan dras
375a1(mdo sde): sred pa 'gags pas rtsa ba mi skyed pa// brtan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu smad 'byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig
375a2(mdo sde): rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bde legs kyi tshig su bcad pa rdzog s+ho// / 
375a3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ pan tsa ta thA ga ta mang ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigasu bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par
375a4(mdo sde): / snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba nya 'dra de'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye
375a5(mdo sde): dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang / gauti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems
375a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba
375a7(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng
375a8(mdo sde): bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing // tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can don gyi las la thugs ni spror mdzad
375b1(mdo sde): cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la ni byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs
375b2(mdo sde): pa lnga'i bkra shis tshig su bcad brdzog s+ho// / dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan po brang dam pa ru// mi 'pham mgon la rgyal 'tsha bangs par dbang bskur shing // 'dzam gling / 
375b3(mdo sde): nyid du glang chen thal kar ltar gshegs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dam pa zas gtsang sras// bud med skyon bral g.yo
375b4(mdo sde): sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum// lhumasu zla bcur blo gros lnga dan pa shAkya'i rigs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding / dir bde legs shog/ ldum pa'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams
375b5(mdo sde): dga' p+lag sha yi// yal gnas bzung lham gyur tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud// mkha' la gshegs te phyod/ sa bcur pad+ma 'byung 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des
375b6(mdo sde): kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i mdun bzhag nas// mtshan ltas shis pa brjod de ston pa 'byung gyur pa// shAka rigs bud med 'khor ldan
375b7(mdo sde): kun 'dus brgyan btags gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang ring 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong las ni// kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs
375b8(mdo sde): kun pas mchog/ shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor// bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog/ pho brang nas byung rgand 'i'achi ba las byung
376a1(mdo sde): gzigs// mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha'i mdun bdar mkha' la ni// srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthong dbu skra bregs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding
376a2(mdo sde): 'dir bde legs shog/ lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags ngur smrig gos rnams phul// na ra 'dza ra'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs// thub pa bsam gtan nas bzhengs bkra shis 'o/ 
376a3(mdo sde): thug gsol// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shig/ pad+mo las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du// dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gis bdud btul nas// tho
376a4(mdo sde): rangs bdud rtsi mi 'gyur phun tshogs sangs rgyas pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ ba dar na ser chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor// kun shes
376a5(mdo sde): la sogs bden bzhi lnga sde bzang la bstan// lha klu lha min la sogs mi min bdud 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa/ des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ nga rgyal bsnyem par
376a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul zhing // glang chen rab myos mi bzang lha byin gyis spad brtul// drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi mchod// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir
376a7(mdo sde): bde legs shog/ pad+mo gzhon nu lta lha'i mtshan ldan shAkya'i rigs// zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal bltam// bltam pa nas bzungs la'i tshul dum lus
376a8(mdo sde): rdzogs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde lags shog/ byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing // sems can mtha' yas ni bde'i lam la rab bkod nas// grong
376b1(mdo sde): khyer rtsa mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can// tshe lo
376b2(mdo sde): brgyad khri dus na grong khyer nye ldan du// pa to la'i shing drang mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga'
376b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can// tshe lo bdun khri dus na ka na'i grong khyer du// shing mchog sin 'da'i shing drang mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum
376b4(mdo sde): 'tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can// tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer maHdam med du// shing mchog sa la'i shing dang mngon par
376b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni stobs ldan bram ze rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong
376b6(mdo sde): khyer bde ldan du// shi ri sha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dren pa gser thub slab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i
376b7(mdo sde): rigs// tshe lo sum khri dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du// u dum 'bar ba'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ slob
376b8(mdo sde): pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// tshe la nya khri dus na grong khyer bar si ru// n+ya gro ta'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum
377a1(mdo sde): 'tshogs gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du// a sha ta'i shing drung mngon par sangs
377a2(mdo sde): rgyas pa/ ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum 'tshegs gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' dbang gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa// 
377a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni ske dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grag
377a4(mdo sde): shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos mchog dam pa skye da gu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i ba kra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan
377a5(mdo sde): thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi/ sa mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha/ shes dang dpal gyi zhing // 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i
377a6(mdo sde): bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud ris gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas
377a7(mdo sde): nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba dgra zhi ste// rtag tu
377a8(mdo sde): dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras pan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam pa
377b1(mdo sde): 'phel// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin brlabs kyis// phan mdzad lha'i bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs pas// 
377b2(mdo sde): ba yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skying ldan par shog// oM swasti/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga'
377b3(mdo sde): zhing // che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshegs 'dus// go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la
377b4(mdo sde): legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang ba de dang nges gsungs pa// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams
377b5(mdo sde): la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnam 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam
377b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog// dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te// bsod nams ye shes
377b7(mdo sde): les byung ba// dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog/ sems can thams cad ma lus pa// sa rab dga' ba thob par du// rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang // rab tu 'byung ba thob
377b8(mdo sde): par shog/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgya gar skad du/ rad na tra ya sasti ga thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde
